src: Ngexesha leMfazwe yoQhushululu, amazwe alishumi elinesithathu aqala ukubumba urhulumente ophakathi obuthathaka- ngeCongress kuphela kwakheyona nto iphantsi- kwamaNqaku oMdibaniso. Indlu yowiso mthetho ibingenawo amagunya okubiza irhafui, kwaye kungenxa yesizathu sokuba yayingekho balawuli bakazwelonke okanye iijaji, yayixhomekeke kumagunya karhulumente, ebeye ngamanye amathuba angancedisani, ukunyanzelisa yonke imithetho yawo. Ibingenalo negunya lokuyinyathela imithetho yerhafu namaxabiso phakathi kwamazwana. Ii-Articles bezidinga imvume ethe gca kuwo onke amaphondoe phambi koba zingatshintshwa futhi amaphondo adelele urhulumente omkhulu kangangaba abameli bawo ebengabikho rhoqo.

ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central governmentâwith the Congress being its only componentâunder the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: "Ukuba ubukhe wayibukela imuvi ethi National Treasure, unokucinga ukuba imephu yobuncwane yayibhalwe ngasemva kweSibhengezo Senkululeko. Nangona kunjalo, ayiyonyani leyo. Nangona kukho into ebhaliweyo ngasemva koxwebhu, asiyomephu yobutyebi. Emva kwiSibhengezo Sokukhululeka kubhalwe la mazwi ""ISibhengezo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka sange-4 kaJulayi 1776"". Lo mbhalo usemazantsi olo xwebhu, ubhalwe ujonge ezantsi. Ngelixa kungekho mntu waziyo ukuba ngubani oyibhalileyo, kuyaziwa ukuba kwasekuqaleni kobomi bayo, uxwebhu olukhulu lwesikhumba (lilinganisa i-29Â¾ i-intshi nge-24Â½ i-intshi) lwalusongwa ukuze lugcinwe. Ngoku, kusenokwenzeka intoyoba uphawu belufakwe njenge lebheli."
mt: 4 July 1776, the Declaration of Independence was signed. The document was signed on the back. As no one knows who signed it, it is believed to be the first document signed by the president, a large sheet of parchment (29Â¾ by 24Â½ inches) was prepared to be folded. However, it was never folded.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29Â¾ inches by 24Â½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Ekuqaleni kwenkululeko yesizwe, ubuchwephesha baseSingapore Botanic Gardens banceda ukuguqula esi siqithi saba ngumyezo oyi Garden City. Ngo-1981, iVanda Miss Joaquim, intyantyambo entle engumxube nezinye, iye yakhethwa njengentyantyambo yesizwe.
mt: 2015 marks the 150th anniversary of the Singapore Botanic Gardens, which was founded as a Garden City. In 1981, the Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was designated the national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Ekuqaleni kwenkululeko yesizwe, ubuchwephesha baseSingapore Botanic Gardens banceda ukuguqula esi siqithi saba ngumyezo oyi Garden City. Ngo-1981, iVanda Miss Joaquim, intyantyambo entle engumxube nezinye, iye yakhethwa njengentyantyambo yesizwe.
mt: 2015 marks the 150th anniversary of the Singapore Botanic Gardens, which was founded as a Garden City. In 1981, the Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was designated the national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Nangona ukwakhiwa kweephiramidi kwilitye kwaqhubeka de kwasekupheleni koBukumkani Obudala, iiphiramidi zaseGiza zange zogqithwe ngobukhulu nangobugcisa obugqibeleleyo ezakhiwa ngazo. Ubukumkani obutsha base-Egypt yamandulo babumangalisiwe zizikhumbuzo zabo zangaphambili, ezazingaphezulu kweminyaka eliwaka ubudala.
mt: Although the protests in Tahrir Square continue, the Egyptian government has not yet responded to the demands of the protesters. The protesters are demanding the resignation of President Hosni Mubarak, who has been in power for 30 years.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Yakuphela imfazwe nxamnye neFransi, iJamani yaqalisa ukuhlasela isiqithi saseBritane. I code yase-Jamani ebizwa ngokuba yi âOperation Sealionâ.Izixhobo ezinintsi zomkhosi omkhulu wase Britane nozixhaso zawo zaye zalahleka xa babesimka e-Dunkirk, ngoko ke umkhosi wawunkenenkene. Kodwa iRoyal Navy yayinamandla ngaphezu kweGerman Navy (âKriegsmarineâ) yaye yayinokuwoyisa umkhosi ohlaselayo ongena nge-English Channel. Ngoko ke , zazimbalwa kakhulu inqanawa Zomkhosi Wamanzi ezazikufuphi nendawo zohlaseleko njengoko intloko zasisoyika ukuzikiswa luhlaselo ngumkhosi womya weJamani.
mt: 1. The French were the first to be defeated, the Germans then attempted to invade Britain. The German code name for this operation was âOperation Sealionâ. The British Army and its allies were defeated at Dunkirk, but the German Army was not strong enough to cross the English Channel. However, the Royal Navy was stronger than the German Navy (âKriegsmarineâ) and was able to defeat the German Army in the English Channel. However, the German Army was able to defeat the British Army in the English Channel.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack âOperation Sealionâ. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (âKriegsmarineâ) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: "Masiqale ngekcaza malunga neeplani zase Italy. I Italy yaye ingu ""mninawa"" we Jamani ne Japan. Yayinomkhosi ongomelelanga kunye nomkhosi waselwandle ongenamandla, nangona babesanda ukwenza iinqanawa ezine ezintsha kanye ngaphambi kokuqalisa kwemfazwe. Iinjongo eziphambili zase-Itali yayingamazwe aseAfrika. Ukuthimba loo mazwe, kwakuza kufuneka babe nephedi yokuqalisa umkhosi, ukuze umkhosi uwele uLwandle lweMeditera uhlasele iAfrika. Ngenxa yoko, kwafuneka balahle iziseko zase-Bhritane kunye neenqanawa e-Egypt. Ngaphandle kwala manyathelo, iinqwelo zokulwa zase-Italiya zazingafanelekanga ukuba zenze enye into. Ngoku nge Japan. IJapan yayililizwe lesiqithi, njengeBritane."
mt: "An Italian plan. Italy is the "spearhead" of Germany and Japan. They are the land and sea forces, but they have been sent to create new spearheads before the war begins. The initial goals of the Italians were in Africa. To conquer this land, they needed to create a spearhead, so that the sea force of the Mediterranean could conquer Africa. For this reason, they had to take the British colonies and the Egyptian spearheads. Without this, the Italian spearheads would not have been able to create a new spearhead. Like Japan. Japan was given a spearhead, like the British."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Ukufika komhlaba kwe-D-Day kunye neemfazwe ezilandelayo zakhulula amantla eFrance, kodwa amazantsi ayengakhululekanga. Yagwetywa ngama ""Vichy"" French. Aba yayingabantu baseFrance abenza uxolo Phakathi kwamaJamani ngo 1940 baze basebenza nabahlaseli endaweni yokubalwa. Nge-15 ka-Agasti ngo-1940, izizwe Ezimanyeneyo zahlasela emzantsi we-France, kwiphulo elibizwa âOperation Dragoon.â Kwiiveki nje ezimbini, amajoni aseMelika nawaseFransi ayesekhulule umzantsi Fransi ibe ayejonge eJamani."
mt: 6 June 1944, D-Day and the subsequent battles liberated France, but the south was not. The French were collaborators with the Germans. In August 1940, the Vichy French government surrendered to the Germans. On 15 August 1944, Allied forces liberated southern France, in an operation called âOperation Dragoon.â In just two weeks, the French and Americans liberated southern France, and joined the Germans.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Iinqwela mafutha ezintywilayo zenzelwe ukuhambha phantsi kwamanzi, futhi zihlale njalo amaxesha amade ngethuba. Iinqwelo mafutha ezintywilayo zazisetyenziswa kwi-Mfazwe yeZwelonke I futhi nakwi-Mfazwe yeZwelonke II. Ngeloxesha zazicotha zidubulela kufuphi. Ekuqaleni kwemfazwe ubukhulu becala babehamba ngaphezulu elwandle, kodwa njengoko irada yaqalisa ukukhula kunye nokuchaneka ngakumbi, iinkwili zanyanzeleka ukuba zihambe ngaphantsi kwamanzi ukuphepha ukubonwa. Iinkwili zaseJamani zazibizwa ngokuba zii-U-Boats. AmaJamani ayengamachule ekuqhubeni nasekusebenziseni iinkwili zazo. Ngenxa yempumelelo yabo ngenkwili, emva kwemfazwe abase Germans abathembakalanga ukuba basenonintsi lwazo.

ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Nge-17 kaSeptemba, 1939, amajoni asePoland ayesele esoyisiwe, kwaye ekuphela kwethemba yayikukurhoxa, enze uhlengahlengiso kwicala lebhulorho yaseRomania. Nangona kunjalo, ezi zicwangciso zenziwa zangasebenzi phantse ngobusuku nje, xa amajoni angaphezu kwe-800,000 evela eSoviet Union Red Army engena kwaye adala imida ye-Belarussian ne-Ukraine emva kokuhlasela imimandla esempuma yePoland esilwa neRiga Peace Treaty, iSoviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, kunye nezinye izivumelwano zamazwe aphesheya, zombini ezamazwe amabini kunye nezamazwe amaninzi.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish Army was defeated, and the country was occupied, leaving the Romanian border open. However, this was not the end of the war, as the Polish Army of over 800,000 men retreated into the Soviet Union, where they were disarmed and interned in the Belarussian and Ukrainian SSRs after the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other treaties with neighboring countries, were signed.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Izinto zange zihambe kakuhle kuma Taliyane eMantla e-Afrika kwasekuqaleni. Ngeveki nje yokuba i-Italy ivakalise imfazwe ngo June10, 1940, I-1 Hussars yase Britane yayisele ithimbe i-Fort Capuzzo e Libya. Kumathafa asempuma yase Bardia, abase Britane babamba i-Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, u-General Lastucci. On June 28, UMarshal Italo Balbo, iRhuluneli-Jikelele waseLibya kunye nendlalifa ebonakalayo eMuseolini, wabulawa ngumlilo wobungani ngelixa efike Tobruk.
mt: 1st Hussars of the British Army were ambushed by Italian forces at Fort Capuzzo in Libya on June 10, 1940. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and Mussolini's right-hand man, was killed by friendly fire when he arrived in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: I-Tibetan Buddhism yakhelwe kwimfundiso zika Budda, kodwa zongezelelwa yindlela yama mahayan yothando nangendlela ezinzi ezisuka kwi Yoga yamaNdiya. Ngokusisiseko, i-Buddhism yaseTibetan ilula kakhulu. Iquka i-Yoga yaseKundalini, ukucingisisa kunye nendlela yothando olungenamkhethe. Nge-Kundalini Yoga amandla eKundalini (amandla okhanyiso) avuswa ngokuma kweyoga, imithambo yokuphefumla, i-mantra kunye nokubona. Iziko lokucingisiza kweTibet yiYoga yobuThixo. Ngokubonwa kwezithixo ezahlukeneyo iindlela zamandla ziyacocwa, ii-chakras ziyenziwa zisebenze kwaye ulwazi lokukhanyiselwa luyenziwa.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but it also incorporates the Mahayana path of love and the Tantric path of yoga. It is said to be the most popular form of Buddhism. It incorporates Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini energy (spiritual energy), the Kundalini mantra, and the Kundalini vision. The Tibetan Yoga is the Yoga of God. It is said that the spiritual powers are awakened, the chakras are activated, and the spiritual knowledge is revealed.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Inkqubo iqale nge-8: 30 p.m. ixesha lasekhaya (15.00 UTC). Iimvumi ezaziwayo kwilizwe liphela zamela i-bhajans, okanye iingoma zonqulo, kwiinyawo zika Shri Shyam. Imvumi uSanju Sharma uqale ngorhatya, walandelwa nguJai Shankar Choudhary. Imangazelele i-chhappan bhog bhajan nayo. Imvumi, uRaju Khandelwal wayehamba naye. Ngoko, u-Lakkah Singh uyewakhokhela ecula amabhajan. Ii pleyti eziyi 108 ze Chhappan Bhog (ngesiHindu, 56 yezinto ezityekayo, njengeelekese, iziqhamo, amantongomane, izidlo njl njal. ezinikelwa kwisithixo) zazinikelwa kuBaba Shyam. U-Lakkha Singh ubonise i-chhappan bhog bhajan nayo. Imvumi, uRaju Khandelwal wayehamba naye.
mt: 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). The bhajans, or devotional songs, were performed in the presence of Shri Shyam. The first bhajan was sung by Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. The second bhajan was sung by Raju Khandelwal. The third bhajan was sung by Lakkah Singh. The 108 Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 items, such as fruits, sweets, milk, curd, ghee, etc. offered to the deity) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh offered the Chhappan Bhog bhajan. Raju Khandelwal followed him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Abakhweli banikwa amanzi nanjengoko babelinde kwi 90(F)- yamaqondo obushushu. Inkokheli yezomlilo uScott Kouns uthe, ""Yayiyimini eshushu eSanta Clara ngamaqondo obushushu aphezulu kubushushu bee-90. Akukho mnandi ukuvaleleka ixesha elide kwi-roller coaster ibe kuthathe iyure ubuncinane ukukhupha umntu wokuqala obekhwele kuyo."""
mt: 90(F)- degree winds were blowing at the time. Fire Department Captain Scott Kouns said, "I believe the Santa Clara winds were blowing at 90 degrees. There's no doubt that the roller coaster was going to be a bumpy ride for a short period of time before it was going to be over with the first person who was going to be on it."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Ngokweendaba zamva nje, ufundo ngamaqondo olwandle lubonise ukuba itsunami iyaqulunqeka. Ibekhona itsunami echaziweyo kufuphi ne Pago Pago ne Niue. Akukho monakalo mkhulu okanye ukwenzakala okuxeliweyo eTonga, kodwa umbane ulahlekile okwethutyana, ekuthiwa oko kuthintele abasemagunyeni baseTonga ekufumaneni isilumkiso se-tsunami esikhutshwe yi-PTWC. Izikolo ezilishumi elinesine eHawaii ezikumandla onxuse ulwandle ziye zavalwa ngoLwesithathu nangona izilumkiso bezirhoxisiwe.
mt: 1. A tsunami warning was issued for the island of Pago Pago and Niue. There is no major tsunami reported in Tonga, but a tsunami watch was issued for Tonga, as advised by the PTWC. 2. A tsunami watch was issued for the Hawaiian Islands, but the tsunami was not expected to be felt.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: UJonny Reid, umqhubi oncedisayo weqela laseNew Zealand le-A1GP, namhlanje wenze imbali ngokuba ngoyena mqhubi ukhawulezayo oqhuba ngokusemthethweni ukudlula iAuckland Harbour Bridge eneminyaka eyi-48. U Mnumzana u Reid ukwazile ukuqhuba imoto eyi New Zealand's A1GP , Black Beauty kwisantya esingaphezu kwe 160km/h esiphindaphindwe kasixhenxe ngapha kwebhulorho. Amapolisa aseNew Zealand anengxaki yokusebenzisa imipu yayo ye-radar yokujonga isantya ukuze abone ukuba uMnu Reid ubaleka kangakanani ngenxa yokuba phantsi kukaBlack Beauty, kwaye ixesha akwaze ngalo ukubona ukuba uMnu Reid kube ngelixa ecotha ehamba nge-160km/h.
mt: 2007 A1GP champion Johnny Reid, yesterday, made a statement that he is the fastest driver to cross the Auckland Harbour Bridge in 48 years. Mr Reid drove New Zealand's A1GP, Black Beauty at a speed of over 160km/h, while being chased by a police car. New Zealand police used their radar to track the speed of Mr Reid's car to see how close he was to the bridge, and when they saw that he was going at 160km/h, they decided to stop him.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Inyikima ebingenamandla kangako yanyikima entshona yeMontana ngo-10:08 p.m. ngoMvulo. Akukho ngxelo zikhawlezileyo zifunyenwe yi-U.S.Geological Survey (USGS) kunye neZiko loLwazi ngeNyikima. Inyikima ibijikeleze malunga neekhilomitha ezingama-20 (i-15 yeemayile) emantla-mpuma eDillon, kwaye malunga ne-65 km (40 yeekhilomitha) kumazantsi eButte.
mt: 10:08 p.m. local time on Monday, a 4.8 magnitude earthquake struck Montana. The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center have not yet determined the location of the quake. The earthquake was centered about 20 miles (15 miles) northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Ijele yase-Iraq eyi-Abu Ghraib iye yatshiswa ngoxa bekukho uqhankqalazo. Ijele yabanenkohlakalo emva kokufumaniseka kokuxhatshazwa kwebanjwa emva koko umkhosi waseMerika wayithathela kuyo.
mt: 1,000s of Iraqis were tortured at the Abu Ghraib prison. The prison was closed after the torture was revealed. The prison was reopened after the US military left.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Ibhendi irhoxisile umboniso eMaui's War Memorial Stadium, eyayimiselwe ukuzinyaswa ngabantu abangama-9,000, yaza yaxolisa nakubalandeli. Inkampani elawula eli qela lomculo, iHK Management Inc., ekuqaleni khange itsho ukuba kutheni berhoxile ngee-20 zikaSeptemba, kodwa ngosuku olulandelayo ityala ilibeke kwizizathu zothutho.
mt: 9,000 people were evacuated from Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was hosting a concert, after a bomb threat. The concert promoter, HK Management Inc., initially said the threat was a hoax, but the next day police were investigating the incident.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Ukuphanga okuxhaphakileyo kuthiwa kuyaqhubeka ngobusuku, njengoko amagosa onyanzeliso lomthetho ebengekho kwizitalato zaseBishkek. I-Bishkek ichazwe njengeyatshona kwindawo ""yesiphithiphithi"" ngomnye obukeleyo, njengoko amaqela emigulukudu ajikeleza ezitratweni kwaye ephanga iivenkile zempahla yabathengi. Abahlali base-Bishek abaliqela batyhole abaqhankqalazi basemzansi ngokungabinamthetho."
mt: " The fire is said to have continued into the night, as firefighters struggled to contain the blaze. Bishkek is known as the "city of a thousand minarets" for its many mosques, and the fire destroyed a mosque and damaged several other buildings. The city's residents were evacuated and the fire was extinguished by the morning, but the damage to the city's historic buildings was extensive. "
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: "Ukuphanga okuxhaphakileyo kuthiwa kuyaqhubeka ngobusuku, njengoko amagosa onyanzeliso lomthetho ebengekho kwizitalato zaseBishkek. I-Bishkek ichazwe njengeyatshona kwindawo ""yesiphithiphithi"" ngomnye obukeleyo, njengoko amaqela emigulukudu ajikeleza ezitratweni kwaye ephanga iivenkile zempahla yabathengi. Abahlali base-Bishek abaliqela batyhole abaqhankqalazi basemzansi ngokungabinamthetho."
mt: " The fire is said to have continued into the night, as firefighters struggled to contain the blaze. Bishkek is known as the "city of a thousand minarets" for its many mosques, and the fire destroyed a mosque and damaged several other buildings. The city's residents were evacuated and the fire was extinguished by the morning, but the damage to the city's historic buildings was extensive. "
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Ngaphambili, Igosa Eliphezulu lakwaRing, uJamie Siminoff, wathi le nkampani yaqala xa ibheli kwivenkile yakhe esegaraji yayingasebenzi, ingenzi ngxolo. Uye wakha intsimbi yomnyango we-WiFi, wathi. USiminoff uthe ukuthengisa kwandisiwe emva kokubonakala kwakhe ngo-2013 kwisiqendu seShark Tank apho iphaneli yokubonisa yenqabile ukuxhasa ngemali ukuqala kwayo. Ngasekupheleni kuka-2017, uSiminoff kwitshaneli yokuthenga kwiTV enguQVC. U-Ring waye waliphelisa ityala elisemthethweni nenkampani yokhuseleko ekhuphisanayo , i-ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, the Ring company co-founder Jamie Siminoff said the company was founded after his garage was broken into, and he was inspired. Siminoff also created the WiFi network. Siminoff said he was inspired after appearing on the Shark Tank show in 2013. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring was featured in a documentary about the company, the ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Le nkqubo yePBS ifumene iimbasa ze-Emmy ezingaphezu kwe-24, yaye idlale ixesha elifutshane kancinci kune-Sesame Street kunye neMister Roger's Neighborhood. Isiqendu ngasinye somboniso siyakugxila kwisihloko sencwadi ecacisiweyo ukuze kuhlolwe eso sihloko kumabali ngamabali. Umboniso ngamnye uza kubonelela nangeengcebiso zeencwadi ekufuneka abantwana bazikhangele xa besiya kwilayibrari yabo. U -John Grant, wase-WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) uthi : ""i-Reading Rainbow ifundise abantwana ukuba kutheni kufuneka bafunde,â¦bathande ukufunda-[umboniso] ekhuthaza abantwana ukuba bathabathe incwadi bafunde."" Abanye kuquka uJohn Grant, bakholelwa ukuba ukungabikho kwemali nokutshintsha kwendlela eziqhuba ngayo iinkqubo zeTV zokufundisa, ezo zinto zombini zibe negalelo ekuyekisweni kwale nkqubo iziziqendu."
mt: " PBS won 24 Emmys, including two for Sesame Street and Mister Roger's Neighborhood. The program is designed to encourage children to read by providing a model for reading aloud and by making books available to children. John Grant, of WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said: "Reading Rainbow teaches children that reading is fun, and that they should readâ¦[the program] encourages children to read." Other critics say that the program's emphasis on reading and its ability to change the way children view reading, are two of the program's greatest strengths.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading â [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amagosa esixeko sase Amsterdam nase Anne Frank Museum achaza ukuba lomthi usuleleke kukungunda kwaye kunganefuthe elinobungozi empilweni kuba besithi ubusele usengozini yokuwa. Ibilindele ukuwiswa ngoLwesibini, kodwa isindile emva kwesigqibo esingxamisekileyo.
mt: The Amsterdam city council and the Anne Frank Museum have said the incident was a prank and not a hate crime, as the graffiti suggested. The graffiti was removed on Monday, but the damage was not yet repaired.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "I-Animal Liberation kunye neRoyal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (i-RSPCA) kwakhona bafuna ukunyanzelisa ukufakelwa kweekhamera zeCCTV kuzo zonke izilarha zaseAustralia. Umhloli oyintloko we-RSPCA wase New South Wales uDavid O'Shannessy uxelele i-ABC ukuba ukugada kunye nokuhlolwa kwezilarha kufanele kube yinto eqhelekileyo e-Australia. ""Ngokuqinisekileyo i-CCTV ithumela umqondiso owomeleleyo kwaba bantu basebenza nezilwanyana ukuba intlalontle yabo yeyona nto iphambili."""
mt: "The Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) have both won a court order to access CCTV footage from all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief David O'Shannessy told the ABC that the footage would be crucial in exposing the cruelty of Australian abattoirs. ""The CCTV footage will show the public what is really going on in abattoirs."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Namhlanje ngethuba bekungcwatywa uJeff Weise kunye namaxhoba amathathu kulawo asithoba, kusasazeke iindaba zokuba omnye umfundi uye wabanjwa ngokumayela nokudutyulwa kwabantu esikolweni obekwenzeke nge-21 Matshi. Abaphetheyo bathi kuncinci kakhulu okusemthethweni okungqina ukubanjwa kwanamhlanje. Sekunjalo umntu onolwazi ngophando, uye waxelela i-Minneapolis Star-Tribune ukuba ibingu-Louis Jourdain, unyana ona-16 kaFloyd Jourdan Usihlalo we-Red Lake Tribal. Akwaziwa okwangoku ukuba uza kubekwa liphi ityala okanye yintoni ekhokhelele abasemagunyeni kule nkwenkwe kodwa inkundla karhulumente welizwe lonke sele iqalise iinkqubo zomthetho ezichaphazela abantwana.
mt: 17-year-old Jeff Weise was shot and killed by police after killing nine people, including his grandparents and a school security guard, at the Red Lake Senior High School in Minnesota. Police say the death toll could have been much higher if not for the quick response of the school's security guard. The school's principal, however, was killed by Weise before he could lock down the school. The shooting occurred on the same day that the Minnesota Supreme Court ruled that the state's ban on same-sex marriage was unconstitutional. The court's decision was the first of its kind in the United States.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Abaququzeleli babaqhankqalazi bathi malunga nama 100,000 abonakala kwizixeko zase German ezinjenge Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, neHanover. E-Berlin, amapolisa aqikelela abaqhankqalazi abangama-6 500. Uqhankqalazo lweenzeka nase Paris, eSofia eBulgaria, eVilnius eLithuania, eValetta eMalta, eTallinn e-Estonia, nase-Edinburgh naseGlasgow eScotland. ELondon, malunga nabantu abayi-200 baye baqhankqalaza ngaphandle kweeofisi zabantu ababambe amalungelo okubhala nokupapasha imisebenzi yabo. Kwinyanga edlulileyo, bekukho uqhankqalazo olukhulu e-Poland xa ilizwe lityikitya i-ACTA, eyenze urhululmente wase-Poland agqibe kwelukuba angasiqinisekisi eso sivumelwano, okwangoku. ILatvia neSlovakia ziyilibazisile inkqubo yokujoyina i-ACTA.
mt: 100,000 protesters were reported in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valetta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, about 200 protesters gathered outside the European Parliament. Last week, a major protest took place in Poland when the country signed the ACTA, which would have allowed Poland to monitor all internet traffic. Latvia and Slovakia have also refused to join the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Ngama-60 amatyala okungasebenzi kakuhle kwe-iPods kuye kwaxelwa, kubangela imililo emithandathu kwaye kushiye abantu abane benokutsha okuncinci. Umphathiswa wezoqoqosho eJapan, Urhwebo Noshishino (iMETI) uthe bebesazi ngeengozi eziyi-27 ezinxulumene nezixhobo. Kwiveki ephelileyo, i-METI ibhengeze ukuba i-Apple ibazise ngeziganeko eziyi-34 zobushushu obungaphezulu, siganeko eso inkampani ithi ""asibalulekanga."" Emva kokuba u-Apple eye wayirhoxisa ingxelo, isebe liye laphefumla lathi ""oku kube lilishwa."""
mt: 60 of the 100 iPods that were recalled, were found to have a manufacturing defect that caused them to overheat and burn users. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it had received 27 reports of overheating. The METI also said Apple had received 34 reports of overheating, which the company said were "isolated." After Apple denied the reports, the company issued a statement saying it was "looking into the matter."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: USenator okhoyo nenenekazi lokuqala laseArgentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner ubhengeze ukuzigqatsa kwakhe kubupresidanti izolo emalanga eLa Plata, isixeko esikwiikhilomitha eziyi-50 (iimayile eziyi-31) ukusuka eBuenos Aires. UNksk. Kirchner ubhengeze injongo yakhe yokuba ngumongameli e-Argentina Theatre, indawo enye awayeyisebenzisa ukuqala iphulo lakhe le-2005 kwiNdlu yeeNgwevu njengelungu legqiza lephondo laseBuenos Aires.
mt: 2005 Argentine presidential candidate Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was inaugurated as president on Sunday in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Sen. Kirchner was inaugurated at the Argentina Theatre, a venue she used in her 2005 campaign for the first time as a candidate for the Buenos Aires province legislature.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: I-ACMA iphinde yafumanisa ukuba nagona ividiyo ibihanjiswa kwi-intanethi, uBig Brother khange ophule imithetho ye-censorship nanjengoko imidiya ibingagcinwanga kwiwebhusaythi kaBig Brother. IBroadcasting Services Act ibonelela ngolawulo lomxholo we-Intanethi, nangona ukuze ithathwe njengomxholo we-Intanethi, kufuneka ihlale kwiseva.
mt: 1. The ACMA has found that the video clip was broadcast on the internet, Big Brother has been ordered to remove the offensive comments. The Broadcasting Services Act prohibits the broadcast of material on the internet, but to remove the material from the internet, it must be removed from the web.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: I-ACMA iphinde yafumanisa ukuba nagona ividiyo ibihanjiswa kwi-intanethi, uBig Brother khange ophule imithetho ye-censorship nanjengoko imidiya ibingagcinwanga kwiwebhusaythi kaBig Brother. IBroadcasting Services Act ibonelela ngolawulo lomxholo we-Intanethi, nangona ukuze ithathwe njengomxholo we-Intanethi, kufuneka ihlale kwiseva.
mt: 1. The ACMA has found that the video clip was broadcast on the internet, Big Brother has been ordered to remove the offensive comments. The Broadcasting Services Act prohibits the broadcast of material on the internet, but to remove the material from the internet, it must be removed from the web.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "UPeter Costello, unondyebo waseOstreliya nekukho amathuba amaninzi ukuba odlule iNkulumbuso John Howard njengenkokheli yeLiberal, uyawaxhasa amashishini amandla enyukliya eOstreliya. UMnu. Costello uthe xa amandla okuphuhlisa i-nuclear enengeniso, iOstreliya kumele ijonge ekuwasebenziseni. ""UKuba iyashishinisa, simele sibe nayo. Ukuthi,akukho gunya lichaseneyo namandla enuclear"" watsho uMnu Costello."
mt: "Former Australian Treasurer Peter Costello, who is also a nuclear energy advocate, has urged the Australian government to abandon its nuclear power plans. Mr Costello said if the government was serious about nuclear power, it should be serious about it. ""If it's serious, it should be serious. There should be no half measures"" Mr Costello said."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Njengoba kukhona ii-medals ezilishumi elinesibhozo kuphela ngosuku, amazwe abalekayo ohlulekile ukuqabela iqonga lee-medals. Ziquka i-Netherlands, no-Anna Jochemsen egqiba engowethoba kwi-women's standing class kwi Super-G izolo, nase Finland no Katja Saarinen egqiba engoweshumi kwakulomnyadala. Owase Australia u Mitchell Gourley wagqiba kweye shumi elinanye I-men's standing Super-G. Owase Czech umgqatswa uOldrich Jelinek wagqiba kwindawo yeshumi elinesithandathu i-men's sitting Super-G. U-Arly Velasquez wase-Mexico uphume ishumi elinesihlanu kwindawo yokuhlala kwamadoda i-Super-G. IHolo yaseAdam yaseNew Zealand iphume isithoba kwindawo yamadoda iSuper-G Indoda yasePoland engaboniyo uMaciej Krezel nomkhokheli wayo Anna Ogarzynska bagqiba kwindawo yeshumi elinesithathu kwi Super -G. Owase South Korea u Jong Seork Park wagqiba kwindawo yamashumi amabini anesine kweyamadoda ahleliyo iSuper-G.
mt: 10 medals were awarded on the first day, but many countries had their first medal. The Netherlands' Anna Jochemsen won a bronze in the women's standing Super-G, and Finland's Katja Saarinen won a silver in the women's sitting Super-G. Australia's Mitchell Gourley won a bronze in the men's standing Super-G. Czech skier Oldrich Jelinek won a bronze in the men's sitting Super-G. Mexico's Arly Velasquez won a bronze in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall won a bronze in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska won a bronze in the men's Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park won a silver in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Itrial zaqhubeka eBirmingham Crown Court kwaye zagqitywa nge-3 ka-Agasti. Umsasazi, oye wabanjwa kwindawo yesiganeko, ukukhanyele ukuhlasela wabanga ngelithi usebenzise intonga ukuzikhusela kwibhotile abegityiselwangazo ngabantu abangamashumi amathathu. UBlake wagwetyelwa ukuzama ukugqwetha ikhondo lobulungisa. Ijaji yamxelela u-Blake ukuba âbekungekho kuncedaâ wayezakuya ejele.
mt: 3 August 2010, the trial continues at Birmingham Crown Court. The defendant, who was found guilty of manslaughter, admitted using a knife to stab the victim, who was attacked by three men. Blake was sentenced to life imprisonment. The judge told Blake that he was âlucky to be aliveâ and would be released in 2010.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Ezinye izifundo ezikwi-ajenda eBali zibandakanya ukugcina amahlathi ashiyekileyo emhlabeni, kunye nokwabelana ngeetekhnoloji ukunceda amazwe asaphuhlayo ukuba akhule ngeendlela ezingangcolisiyo. i-U.N. futhi ithembha ukugqibezela imali yokunceda amazwe achaphazelwe yi-global warming ukuncedisa abachaphazelweyo. Imali inokuya kwizindlu ezinokukhusela umkhukula, ulawulo lwamanzi olungcono, kunye nokwahluka kwezityalo.
mt: Other studies in Bali included how to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and how to help developing countries adapt to climate change. The U.N. and other groups are seeking funds to help developing countries adapt to global warming. Money is needed for housing, water purification and infrastructure.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Kwiveki engaphambi kwengqungquthela iNigeria ibikhe yazisa ukuba iceba ukuzibandakanya ne-AfCFTA . Umkhomishinala we-AU kurhwebo noshishino u-Albert Muchanga wazise ukuba iBenin iza kujoyina. Umkomishala uthe, âAsikavumelani ngemithetho emalunga nemvelaphi kunye nokususwa kwerhafu, kodwa umgaqo esinawo wanele ukuba siqalise ukurhweba ukususela ngo-1 Julayi 2020.â
mt: The Nigerian government has warned that it will not sign the AfCFTA agreement. The AU commissioner for trade and industry, Albert Muchanga, said Benin will be the first to sign. He said, âWe are not bound by the rules of procedure and the agenda, but the decision to sign the agreement will be taken on July 1, 2020.â
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Wafumana udumo olugxekwayo ngexesha lakhe e-Atlanta kwaye yaqatshelwa ngemfundo edolophini enobuchule Ngo-2009 wawongwa ngokuba Yintsumpa yonyaka Kwilizwe lonke. Ngexesha lokwethweswa kweembasa, izikolo zaseAtlanta ziye zafumana amanqaku eemviwo aphucuke kakhulu. Emveni nje kancinane, Umgaqo siseko i Atlanta Journal ipapashe ingxelo ebonisa iingxaki ezineziphumo zovavanyo. Ingxelo ibonise ukuba iziphumo zeemviwo zinyuke ngendlela engaqhelekanga, yaye ityhole ngelithi isikolo sizibonile iingxaki kodwa khange senze nto ngengxelo. Ubungqina emva koko babonisa ukuba amaphepha ovavanyo aphazanyiswe yaye uHall, kunye namanye amagosa ezemfundo angama-34, abekwa ityala ngo-2013.

src: Ibhombu enye yadubula ngaphandle kweofisi Yeruluneli Jikelele Ezinye iibhombu ezintathu zaqhuma kufutshane nezakhiwo zikarhulumente kwisithuba seeyure ezimbini. Ezinye iingxelo zibeka inani elisemthethweni lokufa kwabantu abasibhozo, kwaye iingxelo ezisemthethweni ziqinisekisa ukuba i-30 yenzakele; kodwa amanani okugqibela awaziwa.
mt: 1 plane crashed into a building, 2 other planes crashed into government buildings. Other reports say 30 people are dead, but this is unconfirmed.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017 from Brazilian side Palmeiras for a reported Â£27 million fee. Since then, he has played 53 games for the club, scoring 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of Â£27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Indlu yabavakashi iwile, e-Mecca, idolophu engcwele yama-Silamusi mhlawumbi ngentsimbi yesi-10 kulentsasa kwixesha lasengingqini. Esi sakhiwo sasihlala iqela labandwendweli makhaya ababeze kutyelelo lwesixeko esingcwele phambi kohambo lwenqanawa yeHajj. Iindwendwe zehostele ubuninzi bingabemi baseUnited Arab Emirates. Inani lokufa liyi-15 ubuncinci, nani elo kulindeleke ukuba linyuke.
mt: 10 people were killed in a fire in a Mecca hotel, the Saudi capital of the Muslim world. The fire destroyed a section of the hotel that was under construction before the Hajj pilgrimage. The fire was caused by a short circuit in a United Arab Emirates air conditioning unit. 15 people were injured, some of them seriously.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Iisathelayithi, zombini ezazinobunzima obungaphezulu kweepawundi ezili-1000, kwaye zihamba malunga neekhilomitha ezingama-17,500 ngeyure, zangqubana neekhilomitha ezingama-491 ngaphezulu koMhlaba. Ososayensi bathi uqhambuko qubulo olubangelwe lungquzulwano lube lukhulu. Basazama ukujonga ukuba umonakalo ubemkhulu kangakanani na nokokuba umhlaba uchaphazeleka kanjani na. Umyalelo oCwangcisiweyo wase-United States weSebe lezoKhuselo laseMelika ulandelela inkunkuma. Iziphumo eziconjululiweyo zeplotti ziza kuposwa kwiwebhusaythi kawonkewonke.
mt: 2 of the 3 largest meteorites ever found, weighing over 1000 pounds, and traveling at speeds of 17,500 miles per hour, collided with the Earth. Scientists say the impact was massive. They are trying to figure out how big the impact was and how much damage it did to the Earth. The US Geological Survey has issued a warning. The meteorites are expected to hit the Earth in the next few hours.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Iisathelayithi, zombini ezazinobunzima obungaphezulu kweepawundi ezili-1000, kwaye zihamba malunga neekhilomitha ezingama-17,500 ngeyure, zangqubana neekhilomitha ezingama-491 ngaphezulu koMhlaba. Ososayensi bathi uqhambuko qubulo olubangelwe lungquzulwano lube lukhulu. Basazama ukujonga ukuba umonakalo ubemkhulu kangakanani na nokokuba umhlaba uchaphazeleka kanjani na. Umyalelo oCwangcisiweyo wase-United States weSebe lezoKhuselo laseMelika ulandelela inkunkuma. Iziphumo eziconjululiweyo zeplotti ziza kuposwa kwiwebhusaythi kawonkewonke.
mt: 2 of the 3 largest meteorites ever found, weighing over 1000 pounds, and traveling at speeds of 17,500 miles per hour, collided with the Earth. Scientists say the impact was massive. They are trying to figure out how big the impact was and how much damage it did to the Earth. The US Geological Survey has issued a warning. The meteorites are expected to hit the Earth in the next few hours.

The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: "Urhuluneli wase California u Arnold Schwarzenegger watyikitya ukuba ibe ngumthetho ukuthintela ukuthengiswa okanye ukuqeshwa kwevidiyo zokudlala ezinemfazwe kubantwana. Umthetho oyilwayo ufuna imidlalo yevidiyo enogonyamelo ithengiswe kwiphondo laseCalifornia ukuba ibhalwe uphawu lokufunda ""u-18"" kwaye yenze ukuba ukuthengisa kwabo umntwana kohlwaywe isohlwayo se- $ 1000 ngetyala."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger has signed a bill that would make it a crime to show a child pornography video. The bill would make it a felony to show a child pornography video to a minor under the age of 18 and would require a $1,000 fine for each offense."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "UDuvall, otshatile enabantwana ababini abadala, akazange ashiye umbono omkhulu kuMiller, owayebaliselwe ibali. Uthe ebuzwa izimvo zakhe, u-Miller uthe ""u-Mark uthethe kakhulu engxoxweniâ¦Bendizilungiselela ngoku andimvanga ukuba ebesithini."""
mt: ""Duvall, you're a father of two young children, you can't be that sure of yourself with Miller. He said, 'Mark talks a lot about gunsâ¦I'm not sure what he's talking about.'"""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Inkulumbuso uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela urhulumente 'Umthetho woMoya Ococekileyo' kwikomiti yamaqela onke ukuba iphonononge, phambi kokufundwa kwayo okwesibini, emva kwentlanganiso yemizuzu engama-25 yangoLwesibini kunye nenkokheli ye-NDP uJack Layton kwi-PMO. ULayton ucele ukuba kubekho utshintsho kwi conservatives environmental bill kwintlanganiso no PM, ecela ukuba ""ibhalwe ngocoselelo olugqibeleleyo"" uxwebhu olungendalo lombutho oyiConservative. Mhlanazana I Federal Government yangenelela ekuthabathethi kuyo ukuxhasa ngezimali isibhedlela I Mersey e Devonport,Tasmania, urhulumente ophetheyo kunye namalungi epalamemete efederali asigxeka esi senzo njengengozi ekhokhela ulonyulo eluzakubakho ngo Novemba. Kodwa u-Nkulumbuso u-John Howard uthe isenzo senzelwe kuphela ukukhusela amaziko esibhedlele ekuthotyelweni ngurhulumente wase-Tasmania, ngokunika i-AUD engaphezulu kwe-$45 izigidi."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has sent a letter to all members of Parliament to inform them that the Conservative government's environmental bill will be introduced in the next session, after a 25-member committee has finished its review. NDP leader Jack Layton said the Conservatives' environmental bill is a "sham" and that the PM is "playing games." The Federal Government has announced a $45 million grant to the Mersey Development Authority in Devonport, Tasmania, to help build a new port. But Prime Minister John Howard said the grant is only to help build a new port for the Tasmanian government, not a new port for the Federal Government, which will be built in November. "
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Zombini i-cyanuric acid nemelamine zafunyanwa kwisampula zomchamo wezilwanyana ezife emveni kokutya ukutya kwezilwanyana okunethyefu. Iikhompawundi ezimbini ziyadibana zenze izinto eziqaqambileyo anokuqanda umsebenzi wentso, batsho abaphandi bakule yunivesithi. Abaphandi baqaphela iikristali ezenziwe kumchamo wekati ngokudibanisa i-melamine kunye ne-cyanuric acid. Ukubumbeka kwezi kristali kufana noko kufunyanwa kumchamo wezilwanyane xa uthelekiswe ne-spectostrophy ye-infrared (FTIR).
mt: 2 cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the formula of baby milk powder. Two scientists from the university were killed in the explosion. The scientists found crystals in the formula that were made by mixing melamine and cyanuric acid. The explosion was caused by the mixing of the crystals.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "I-Xinhua ixele isithi abaphandi bakwarhulumente bafumene ezimbhini ii-âblack boxâ zeerekhoda zenqwelo-moya ngoLwesithathu. Ezinye i-wrestlers zanikezela imbeko kuLuna. UTommy Dreamer uthe ""uLuna wayenguKumkanikazi wokuqala we-Extreme. Umphathi wam wokuqala. ULuna wasweleka ngobusuku beenyanga ezimbini. Wayemhle yedwa njengaye. Umfazi owomeleleyo."" UDustin ""Goldust"" uRunnels uphawule ukuba ""uLuna wayengenangqondo njengam ... mhlawumbi nangaphezulu ... ndiyamthanda kwaye ndizakumkhumbula ... ngethemba lokuba ukwindawo engcono."""
mt: "Xinhua reports that the government has recovered the "black box" from the crashed plane on Wednesday. Some wrestlers are mourning the loss of Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first woman of the Extreme. The first wrestler. Luna was killed in a two-day period. She was loved by all. A true lady."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels added that ""Luna was not a... good... person... I loved her... and I will miss her... I hope she is in a better place."""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Nangona abantu abathathu babengaphakathi endlwini xa imoto ibiyigilisa, akukho namnye kubo owonzakeleyo. Kunjalo, umqhubi ufumene ukulimala okumandla entloko. Indlela apho ingozi yenzeke khona iye yavalwa okwethutyana ngexesha abeenkonzo zoncedo olungxamisekileyo bekhulula umqhubi kwi-Audi TT ebomvu. Waye wangeniswa kuqala kwisibhedlela i-James Paget Hospital e-Great Yarmouth. Waye watshintshelwa kwisibhedlela I-Addenbrooke's Hospital eCambridge.
mt: 3 people were inside the car when it crashed, but none were injured. However, the pilot was killed instantly. The car, a red Audi TT, was found on its roof. He was first taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth, but was later transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Imidlalo iqale ngo-10: 00 ekuseni ngemozulu entle kwaye ngaphandle kwentsasa ebike yabanda yayeka ngokukhawuleza, ibilusuku oluhle lombhoxo wesi-7. Abaphambili kule tonamente, uMzantsi Afrika uqale kakuhle xa besoyisa lula iZambiya engunamba 5 ngo-26 - 00. Ubonakala ngokucacileyo ukuba akakho sefomini kulo mdlalo ukunye neSouthern sisters, kodwa ke iSouth Africa iye yaphucula ngokuthe ngcembe njengoko ukhuphiswano luqhubeka. Ukuzikhusela kwabo okuqeqeshekileyo, izakhono zokuphatha ibhola kunye nomsebenzi ogqwesileyo weqela ubenze bagqama kwaye kwacaca ukuba eli liqela eliza kubethwa.
mt: 10:00 am local time, the game started with a short break and the first half ended with a 7-0 score. The hosts, South Africa, started well against Zambia, winning 5-0 on 26 - 00. It seemed that the game was over, but the South African sisters did not give up and the game continued. The final score was 2-0.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Kule minyaka ingamashumi mathathu adlulileyo, nangona ngokusemthethweni ililizwe lamaKomanisi, iTshayina inoqoqosho olubandakanya amashishini abucala. Inguqu zokuqala zophuhliso zenziwa phantsi kokukhokhelo lukaDeng Xiaoping. Ukusukela ngoko, ubungakanani boqoqosho lwase China lukhule ngokuphindwe ka-90. Okokuqala ngqa, kunyaka ophelileyo i-China ikhuphe iimoto ezininzi kunaseJamani kwaye yagqitha neMelika ngokuba yeyona marike inkulu kolu shishino. I-GDP yase China inokuba nkulu kune-United States kwisithuba samashumi amabini eminyaka.
mt: 1990s saw the rise of the Chinese Communist Party, Deng Xiaoping's first reform. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90%. First, China exported many cars to Germany and the United States, making it the world's largest car manufacturer. China's GDP is now larger than that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Ziyakukwenza inzame zokunciphisa I-carbon dioxide ngokwe unit ye-GDP eqaphelekayo ngo 2020 ukusuka kwizinga lika 2005,"" utshilo u-Hu. Akakhange abeke nani ekuza kunqunyulwa kulo, esithi luya kwenziwa ngokusekelwe kumphumo wezoqoqosho lwaseTshayina. U-Hu ukhuthaze amazwe asaphuhlayo ""ukunqandaindlela endala wokungcolisa kuqala nokucoca kamva."" Wongeze wathi ""akufuneki, nokuba, bacelwe ukuba bathathe uxanduva oludlula kwinqanaba labo lokukhula, uxanduva kunye namandla abo."""
mt: """We will reduce carbon dioxide emissions by one unit of GDP by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said, adding that the country will not be forced to do so, but that it will be done voluntarily in accordance with the Chinese government's plan. Hu stressed developing countries ""will take the lead in reducing emissions first and then transferring technology."" He said, ""We will not force others to do so, but if we can, we will help developing countries to reduce emissions and transfer technology."""
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Umbutho wesisa wezonyango uMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kunye noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi bathi sisifo esibi kakhulu esibhaliweyo kweli lizwe. Isithethi se Medecines Sans Frontiere uRichard Veerman sithe: ""iAngola ijongene nolona lwakhe lwalubi uqhambuko kwaye isimo sihleli sisibi kakhulu eAngola,"" utshilo."
mt: "Angola's health ministry, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say the disease is widespread in the country. Medecines Sans Frontiere's Richard Veerman said: ""Angola has been hit hard by the worst outbreak in its history,"" he said."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: UMlawuli wezoTshutshiso loLuntu, u-Kier Starmer QC, wenze ingxelo ngale ntsasa evakalisa ukutshutshiswa kwabo bobabini uHuhne noPryce. U-Huhne urhoxile kwaye oza kungena esikhundleni kwiKhabhinethi ngu-Ed Davey MP. Norman Lam MP kulindeleke ukuba athathe umsebenzi woMphathiswa Wezamashishini uDavey uyaphuma. UHuhne noPryce bacwangciselwe ukuvela kwiNkundla kaMantyi yaseWestminster ngoFebruwari 16.
mt: 1. The Leader of the Opposition, Kier Starmer QC, has written to the Prime Minister to demand an urgent statement on the conduct of the Health Secretary, Matt Hancock, and the Chief Whip, Chris Pryce. Mr Hancock has resigned and Mr Pryce is expected to leave the Government. Norman Lamb MP has called for the Health Secretary, Ed Davey MP, to resign. Mr Hancock and Mr Pryce have been referred to the Westminster Standards Committee on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Ibali elivezwe kumdlalo weqonga waseFrance, nguCamille Saint-Saens, lelomzobi ""obomi bakhe buchazelwa luthando lweziyobisi kunye neJapan."" Ngenxa yoko, abenzi bomdlalo batshaya intsangu kwiqonga, kwaye nethiyetha ngokwayo ikhuthaza abaphulaphuli ukuba bajoyine."
mt: The piece was written by Camille Saint-Saens, who dedicated it to his "friends, who are loved by the Japanese." Because of this, the piece is often played with a Japanese theme, and the score encourages the performers to be expressive.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "U-Leonov, okwabizwa ngokuba ngu ""cosmonaut No. 11"", wayeyinxalenye yeqela lasekuqaleni le Soviet cosmonauts. Ngomhla we-18 ngeyoKwindla, ngo-1965, wenza eyokuqala inqwelo enomtu phakathi (i-EVA), okanye ""ukuhambhemoyeni"", eshiyeke yedwa phandle kwenqwelo yezulu ngapha kancinci kwimizuzu elishumi elinesibini. Wafumana ""Iqhawe leSoviet Union"", elona wongaa liphezulu leSoviet Union, ngomsebenzi wakhe. Kwiminyaka elishumi kamva, wakhokela icandelo laseSoviet le-Apollo- Soyuz mission ebonisa ukuba ugqatso lwasemajukujukwini luphelile."
mt: 18 March 1965, Leonov became the first man to perform an EVA, or "spacewalk", outside the spacecraft. He was awarded the Soviet Union's highest honor, the Hero of the Soviet Union, for his work. In 1975, he served as a cosmonaut on the historic Apollo-Soyuz mission, which demonstrated the peaceful use of space.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the ApolloâSoyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Emveni kokwehla kwesiganeko, u ibson wathunyelwa kwisibhedlela kodwa wasweleka ngokukhawuleza emva koko. Umqhubi welori, oneminyaka eyi-64, ebengalimelanga ekutshayisweni. Isithuthi ngokwaso sasuswa kwindawo yengozi malunga ne-1200 GMT kwangolo suku lunye. Umntu osebenza kwigaraji ekufuphi nalapho kwenzeke khona ingozi uthe: ""Bekukho abantwana abalinde ukuwela indlela kwaye bonke bebekhala belila."" Bonke babaleka babuyela apho kwenzeke khona ingozi."
mt: 64-year-old pilot was killed in the crash, but survived the initial impact. The fire was extinguished about 1200 GMT one hour later. A man working at the airport said: ""There were children in the car and everyone was screaming."" All escaped unharmed.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Umsebenzi owenziweyo ubuninzi yithiyori, kodwa inkqubo ibhalelwe ukulinganisa ukubonwa okwenziwe weSagittarius galaxy. Imiphumela iqela elaliyikhangela ibisenobangelwa ngumsinga wamandla apahakathi kobumnyama begalaxy nobumnyama be matter ye Milky Way. Kanye njengokuba inyanga iwutsala umhlaba, itsho ibangele amaza, kunjalo ke nangeMilky Way etsala umnyele weSagittarius. Linzululwazi ziqgibe ukuba i-matter emnyama uchaphazela i-matter emnyama ngendlela eqhelikeyo i-matter enza ngayo. Le ithiyori ithi uninzi lwezinto ezimnyama ezijikeleze zibekwe zijikeleze ngohlobo lwe-halo, kwaye zenziwe ngamasuntswana amancinci.

ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Ingxoxo-mpikiswano yavuselelwa yimpikiswano malunga nenkcitho yokunceda kunye nolwakhiwo kwakhona kwiNkanyamba uKatrina; ezinye zezezimali ezigcinwe ngokuzonwabisa ziye zalibiza igama elithi ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Ukugxekwa nguLiberal kumzamo wokwakha ngokutsha kugxile ekunikezelweni kweekhontrakthi zokwakha ngokutsha kubantu baseWashington abangaphakathi."
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief bill was called "Bush's New Orleans Deal" by Liberals in the Washington D.C. area.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Xa icapsule ingena ehlabathini ingene emoyeni womhlaba, ngaboo 5 ekuseni (kwixesha labucala basekhohlo), kulindelwe ukuba izokhanya ibonakale kwabantu base-Northen California, e-Oregon, e-Nevada, nase-Utah. I-capsule iza kufana kakhulu nenkanyezi yokudubula ehamba isibhakabhakeni. I-capsule iza kuhamba malunga neekhilomitha eziyi-12.8 okanye imayile eziyi-8 ngomzuzwana, ikhawuleza kakhulu kangangokuba ingasuka eSan Francisco iyofika eLos Angeles ngomzuzu omnye. I-Stardust siya kophula irekhodi elitsha lokuba sesona sipacecraft sibalekayo ukubuyela emhlabeni, sisophula irekhodi lakuqala elalibekwe ngo Meyi ka-1969 ngexesha lokubuyela kuka-Apollo X command module. Iza kuhamba kunxweme olusentshona kumantla eCalifornia kwaye iya kukhanyisa isibhakabhaka ukusuka eCalifornia ukuya kumbindi weOregon idlule phakathi eNevada naseIdaho naphakathi e-Utah, uTom Duxbury, umphathi weprojekthi kaStardust utshilo.
mt: 5 am (local time) a fireball was seen in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The fireball was very bright and left a trail of smoke. The fireball was moving at about 12.8 miles per second and 8 miles per second in altitude, making it possibly the largest meteor to enter the atmosphere since the 1969 Stardust spacecraft returned to Earth. It was moving from California to Los Angeles in one direction and from California to Oregon in the other. Tom Duxbury, the Stardust project manager, said the fireball was seen in California, Nevada, Idaho, and Utah.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. âIt will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,â Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Abasemagunyeni bathi, ugqirha obesebenza kwiChildrenâs Hospital of Pittsburgh, ePennsylvania uza kutyholwa ngokubulala okumasikizi emva kokuba umama wakhe efunyenwe efile kwibhuti yemoto yakhe ngoLwesithathu. UGq. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, wafunyanwa eBlue Ash, eOhio, indawo yokuhlala exele umgama ongangeemayile eziyi-15 emantla eCincinnati lying phantsi ecaleni kwendlela enxibe isikipa nempahla yangaphantsi kubonakala ukuba ukwimo ebisele amachiza kakhulu. Wayalela amagosa ukuba aye kwimoto yakhe eyi-Oldsmobile Intrigue eyaykumgama weenyawo eziyi-500. Bawufumene umzimbha ka Saroja Balasubramanian, ona-53, egqunywe ziingubo ezinegazi. Amapolisa athi kubonakala ngathi umzimba ubusele upha kangangosuku.
mt: 29-year-old Malar Balasubramanian, a resident of Blue Ash, Ohio, was found dead in a car in the parking lot of the Childrenâs Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, on Wednesday. Gq. Balasubramanian, 29, was found in a 1999 Oldsmobile Intrigue with a gunshot wound to the head. His wife, Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, was found dead in the home. Police say the death appeared to be a murder-suicide.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

mt: 1 of the biggest sellers on eBay. The company is hoping to expand its product line and popularity in countries such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Xa umlo uphelile emva kokuba owonzakeleyo ethunyelwe esibhedlele, malunga ne-40 yamanye amabanjwa aseleyo ahlala eyadini akwala ukubuyela kwizisele zawo. Abaxolelanisi bazama ukuyilungisa imeko, kodwa izidingo zamabanjwa azicacanga. Phakathi kwentsimbi ye-10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, umlilo uqalwe ngamabanjwa eyadini. Kungekudala, amagosa afakelwe izixhobo zoqhushululu angena eyadini aza avalela amabanjwa irhasi yenyembezi. Kuthe isiba ngu-11:35 pm, abacimi-mlilo babe bede bakwazi ukuwucima umlilo.
mt: 40 people were injured in the explosion, some of them were taken to the hospital. The fire was extinguished at around 11:00 pm MDT. The explosion was caused by a gas leak. At 11:35 pm, the fire was put out and the injured were taken to the hospital.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
