src: "Izimvo zabantu , layivu kumabonwakude, ibikokokuqala ukuba imithombo yeendaba ephezulu yase Iran ivume ukuba izohlwayo zinefuthe. Zibandakanya ukuthintelwa kwezezimali kunye noku bhenishwa yi-European Union ekukhupheni ngaphandle i-oyile ekrwada, apho uqoqosho lwaseIran lufumana u-80% wengeniso esuka kumanye amazwe. Kwingxelo yayo yakhutsha nje, I Opec ithi urhwebo lwe crude luwele kwelona zinga liphantsi kwidikeydzi ezimbini ngebhareli eziyi 2.8 yezigidi ngosuku. Inkokheli yelilizwe, u-Ayatola Ali Khamenei, uchaze ukuxhomekeka kwi oli njengo ""thiyiselwa"" okuvela phambhiko Tshintsho kwamaSilamusi ase-Islam ngo1979 futhi apho izwe kwafuneka lizikhulule."
mt: "Human rights, the first victim of the Iranian regime's lies. It has been reported that the EU has imposed sanctions on Iran for its nuclear program. Iran receives 80% of its income from oil exports to many countries. In his speech, the Opec said that crude oil production will increase by 2.8 million barrels per day by the end of this year. The religious leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has called for the "sacrifice" of the Islamic Republic of Iran in the face of the US-led sanctions in 1979 and the country needs to be liberated."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: E-France, umthetho wokuvota sisenzo esiqhele ubuchwepheshe obusezantsi: abavoti bayazohluka bangene kwiindawo zovota, babeke iphepha-eliselibhaliwe elichaza iqela abalikhethileyo. Emva koba amagosa eqinisekise iincukaca zomvoti, umvoti ufake imvlophu kwibhokisi yovota futhi atyikitye iphepha lokuvota. Umthetho wonyulo wase-France uqinisekisa ngokuqatha inkqubo. Ukususela ngo 1988, ibhokisi ze ballot kufuneka zikhanye ukuze ababhekise iliso nabavoti babe nobungqina bokuba akukho zimvulophu zikhoyo ekuqaleni kwevoti nokuba akukho zimvulophu zongezelelweyo ngaphandle kwezo zabo babaliweyo nabagunyazisiweyo abavoti. Abagqatswa bangathumela abameli ukuba bazokungqina lonke icandelo lenkqubo. Ngokuhlwa, iivoti zibalwa ngamavolontiya phantsi kolawulo olunzima, zilandela iinkqubo ezithile.
mt: In France, the voting system is secret: voters are alone in the voting booth, and the ballot paper indicates the candidate they have voted for. After the vote, the voter deposits the ballot in the ballot box and tears up the voting paper. The French voting system guarantees the secrecy of the vote. Since 1988, the ballot paper must be perforated so that the voter can tear it up without leaving any trace of the vote and without leaving any trace of the vote other than the ballot box. Those who are unable to tear up the ballot paper are assisted by the polling station staff. The disabled are allowed to use any voting method. In practice, the votes are counted by volunteers outside the polling station, and the results are then announced.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Ukuba kuqinisekisiwe, ukufunyanwa ngokugqibeleyo iminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo yokukhangela uMusashi. Emva kokujonga ubunzulu bamanzi iinxalenye zayo ezaphukileyo zifunyanwe ngokusebenzisa iROV. Omnye wabantu abazizityebi emhlabeni, u-Allen uxele ukuba utyale ubutyebi bakhe kuphononongo lwaselwandle kwaye waqala iphulo lakhe lokufumana iMusashi esusela emdleni wakudala wobomi kule mfazwe.
mt: If confirmed, the remains of the 60-year-old pilot were found in the wreckage of the plane. After the plane crashed into the water, the wreckage was found using a ROV. One of the world's most famous divers, Allen, said he was saddened by the loss of his friend in the shipwreck and began his search for the Musashi in the depths of the ocean.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Umabonakude ubonisa umsi onhlophe ophuma kubuxhakaxhaka. Abasemagunyeni ekuhlaleni alumkisa abahlali abakufuphi nesakhiwo ukuba bahlale phakathi kwamasango, bacime iziphozisi bushushu kwaye bangawaseli amanzi aphuma etephini. Ngokwe-nuclear agency yaseJapan, i-radioactive caesium ne iodine ifumanekile kule planti. Abasemagunyeni bacinga ukuba oku kubonisa ukuba izikhongozeli ezibambe amafutha e-uranium kule ndawo zinokuqhekeka kwaye ziyavuza.
mt: 1. A white smoke was seen coming from the reactor building. Local media reports that residents in the area were told to stay indoors, turn off their air conditioners and close their windows. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine were released from the plant. Officials are concerned that uranium fuel rods in the reactor are damaged and leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "UGqr. Tony Moll wafumanisa Isifo Sephepha Esingawevayo Amayeza (XDR-TB) kummandla oseMzantsi Afrika, KwaZulu-Natal. Kwi Interview, wathi okutsha okukhethekileyo Kwaku ""hlupha kakhulu kwaye kusothusa ngenxa yezinga lokufa eliphezulu."" Ezinye izigulana zisenokuba zisuleleke yontsholongwane esibhedlela, ucinga njalo u Dr. Moll, kwaye ababini kubo ibingabasebenzi basesibhedlela. Ngexesha lonyaka omnye, umntu osulelekileyo wosulela abantu abasondeleyo abali-10 ukuya kwi-15. Nangona, ipesenti yeXDR-TB kwiqela lonke Labantu abane tuberculosis lisabonakala lisezantsi; 6 000 yabantu abayi 330 000 abosulelekileyo ngethuba elithile eMzantsi Afrika."
mt: "UGqr. Tony Moll explains the XDR-TB (extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis) epidemic in South Africa, KwaZulu-Natal. In the interview, he said the "epidemic was very difficult to control and was spreading rapidly." Other patients were also being treated in a hospital, Dr. Moll, and the staff were also being treated. Last year, a patient who was treated for 10 to 15 people. However, the XDR-TB rate in the entire population was not found; 6,000 people were treated for 330,000 people in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: I-NextGen yinkqubo i-FAA ethi ingavumela iinqwelo moya zibhabhe imigama emifutshane zize zonge izigidi zeelitha zamafutha ngonyaka kwayei yehlise izinga lomsi. Isebenzisa ubuchwephesha belanga engafaniyo nale yakudala eyayisebenzisa ubuchwephesha obubheyise kwi ground-radar ukuvumela abalawuli benqwelomoya bakhombe inqwelomoya ngokuchanileyo kwaye banizeze abaqhubi bazo ingcombolo ezichanileyo.
mt: The FAA says the NextGen system will allow aircraft to fly more direct routes, saving fuel and reducing emissions. It will use satellite-based GPS to guide pilots to their destinations, rather than ground-based radar, which is used to guide aircraft to their destinations and is more prone to error.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Abantu bembali bagxeke iipolisi zangaphambili zeFBI ngokusebenzisa ngokuyintloko izinto zalo eziluncedo kumatyala ekulula ukuwacombulula, ingakumbi awokubiwa kweemoto ukuze banyuse izinga lokuphumelela kwabo. ICongress yaqala ukuxhasa ngezimali inyathelo lokungcola ngo-2005 kwaye yacacisa ukuba i-FBI kufuneka inikezele ngeearhente ezili-10 kwimifanekiso engamanyala yabantu abadala.
mt: People were evacuated by police and FBI agents using a fire truck to block the road, allowing them to walk to safety. The Congress was first reported missing in 2005 and the FBI was required to search for them for 10 years.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: I-JAS 39C Gripen yawa endleleni yeenqwelo moya pha ngentsimbi ye 9:30 kusasa kwixesha lasekuhlalenie (0230UTC) yaze yadubula, isikhululo seenqwelo ntaka savalwa ekubeni kufikele kuso iinqwelo ntaka njengesiqhelo. Umqhubi ufumaneke engu Squandron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee Oonondaba basekuhlaleni bxele ukuba isithuthi somlilo sesitishi senqwelomoya siye saphethuka sisazama ukunceda.
mt: 9:30 am local time (0230UTC) on Saturday, the JAS 39C Gripen was flying in formation with a Thai Airways Boeing 747-400 when it collided, causing the plane to crash, killing all 119 people on board. The pilot was Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee Oonondaba, who was reported to have said that the crash was caused by a technical fault.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Kuwo onke ama-1960, u-Brzezinski wasebenzela uJohn F. Kennedy njengomcebisi wakhe emva koko ulawulo luka-Lyndon B. Johnson. Ngexesha lonyulo luka-1976 wayecebisa uCarter kwimicimbi yamazwe angaphandle, emva koko waba Ngumcebisi Wokhuseleko Lelizwe (NSA) ukususela ngo-1977 ukuya ku-1981, ethatha isihlalo sikaHenry Kissinger. Njengomiselwe ukuba yi-NSA, wancedisa uCarter ekucombululeni iingxaki zehlabathi, ezifana ne-Camp David Accords, ngo-1978; ukwenza i-US neTshayina zisebenzisane ngendlela eqhelekileyo ebudeni bokuphela kweminyaka yoo-1970; Ukubhukuqwa kolawulo lwase-Iran, nto leyo eya khokhela ekubanjweni kwabantu ngo-1979; kunye nokuhlaselwa kwe-Afghanistan yi-Soviet Union ngo-1979.
mt: 1960s: Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy after Lyndon B. Johnson's assassination. In 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, serving as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter negotiate the Camp David Accords, in 1978; normalize relations between the US and China, in 1979; and the fall of the Iranian government, which led to the hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing USâChina relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Kuwo onke ama-1960, u-Brzezinski wasebenzela uJohn F. Kennedy njengomcebisi wakhe emva koko ulawulo luka-Lyndon B. Johnson. Ngexesha lonyulo luka-1976 wayecebisa uCarter kwimicimbi yamazwe angaphandle, emva koko waba Ngumcebisi Wokhuseleko Lelizwe (NSA) ukususela ngo-1977 ukuya ku-1981, ethatha isihlalo sikaHenry Kissinger. Njengomiselwe ukuba yi-NSA, wancedisa uCarter ekucombululeni iingxaki zehlabathi, ezifana ne-Camp David Accords, ngo-1978; ukwenza i-US neTshayina zisebenzisane ngendlela eqhelekileyo ebudeni bokuphela kweminyaka yoo-1970; Ukubhukuqwa kolawulo lwase-Iran, nto leyo eya khokhela ekubanjweni kwabantu ngo-1979; kunye nokuhlaselwa kwe-Afghanistan yi-Soviet Union ngo-1979.
mt: 1960s: Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy after Lyndon B. Johnson's assassination. In 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, serving as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter negotiate the Camp David Accords, in 1978; normalize relations between the US and China, in 1979; and the fall of the Iranian government, which led to the hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing USâChina relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Inzalelwane yakwikomkhulu laseCroatia, iZagreb, uBobek wafumana udumo ngelixa wayedlalela iPartizan Belgrade. Wabajoyina ngo-1945 waza wahlala kwade kwango-1958. Ngexesha lakhe kwiqela lakhe, waqokelela amanqaku ayi 403 kwimidlalo eyi 468. Akukho namnye umntu odlale kaninzi okanye ofake amanqaku amaninzi kwiklabhu kunoBobek. Ngowe-1995 wavotelwa njengoyena mdlali uhamba phambili kwimbali yePartizan.
mt: 1945-1958, Bobek played for Zagreb. He scored 403 goals in 468 games. No one has scored more goals in a single season than Bobek. In 1995, he was elected as the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "I-Hesperonychus elizabethae yintlobo yosapho lwe-Dromaeosauride futhi iyazalana ne-Velociraptor. Le ntaka igcwele ziintsiba, inegazi elifudumeleyo kwakukholelwa ukuba ihamba e ngemilenze emibini neenzipho ezifana neVelociraptor. Izipho layo lesibini elalikhulu, labangela kubekho igama elithi Hesperonychus elithetha ""izipho lasentshona."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a small dromaeosaurid closely related to the Velociraptor. The clawed hands, with three fingers, are similar to those of Velociraptor. The three-fingered hands are distinctive."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Malunga anabantu abayi-100 bebeye embhiyozweni, ukuze babhiyozele unyaka wokuqala wabantu ababini ebebetshate kulo nyaka udlulileyo. Umsitho wesikhumbuzo esisesiikweni wawucwangciselwe umhla olandelayo, atsho amagosa. Esi sibini sasitshatele e Texas kunyaka omnye odlulileyo sabuya seza e Buffalo ukuzobhiyoza nezihlobo nezalamane. Lo myeni una-30, owazalelwa eBuffalo, ngomnye wabantu abane abaye babulawo ngoxa bekudutyulwa, kodwa unkosikazi wakhe akonzakalanga.
mt: 100 people were injured in the explosion, the first of two explosions in the same year. The investigation is ongoing. The second explosion occurred in Texas last year and killed 14 people in Buffalo. A 30-year-old man from Buffalo was killed in the explosion, but his wife survived.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: iLuno ibine-120-160 ye-cubic metres yamaftuha ngaphakathi xa yangakwazi ukuhamba kwaye imimoya enkulu kunye namaza ayityhalela elunxwemeni. IHelikopter zihlangule abakhweli abalishumi elinesibini waze olimeleyo waba wophuke impumlo. Inqanawa enobude beemitha eziyi-100 ibisendleleni yokuyothatha umthwalo yawo yomgquba yaye ekuqaleni abasemagunyeni bebesoyikela ukuba le nqanawa ingawuchitha umthwalo wawo.
mt: 120-160 cubic metres of fuel can be stored in the tanks, which can be used to power the engines. The helicopter can carry up to 11 passengers and has a range of 100 miles. The aircraft is equipped with a fire suppression system and a crash-resistant fuel system.
ref: The Luno had 120â160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Impumelelo kaVautier ngaphandle kokuba yi dayirektha ibandakanya ugwayimbo lwendlala ngo-1973 ngokuchasene noko wayekujonga njengothintelo lwezopolitiko. Umthetho waseFrance watshintshwa. I-activism yakhe yabuyela kwiminyaka eyi-15 xa wajoyina i-French Resistance ngexesha leMfazwe yesibini (II) yeHlabathi. Wabhala okuqulathwe ngaye ngo 1998 kwincwadi. pha ngo 1960s ubuyele mva kwi Algeria esandokuzimela eyofundisa ukudayirektha ifilim.
mt: 1. Vautier's activism began in 1973 when he was a student and later a teacher. The French law was changed. His activism lasted for 15 years when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote about his experiences in 1998 in a book. In the 1960s he was in Algeria teaching and learning about activism.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezine baya eRoma ukuya emngcwabeni. Inani labantu ababelapho lalilikhulu kangangokuba ayingumntu wonke okwazileyo ukuphinda afikelele kumngcwabo owawuseSt. Izikrini ezininzi zikamabonakude zafakwa kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo eRoma ukuze abantu babukele umsitho. Kwezinye izixeko zase Italy nakwihlabathi liphela, ikakhulu e Poland, indlela ekulungiselelwe ngayo ibifana, ebiye izobukelwa ngabantu abaninzi.
mt: 1000s of people are in Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people attending is so large that the city has been closed to traffic. In other parts of Italy and the rest of the world, similar events are taking place, with people attending in large numbers.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Ngokweengxelo, indlu kwistrato Macbeth yadubula ngenxa yokuvuza kwegesi. Igosa elivela kwinkampani yegesi liye lafika kuloo ndawo emva kokuba ummelwane eye wakhalaza malunga nokuvuza kwegesi. Xa igosa lifika, isakhiwo saqhushumba. Akukho monzakalo omkhulu oye waxelwa, kodwa ubuncinane bahlanu abantu ebebekwindawo yexhwayelo abaye banyangelwa iimpawu zomothuko ngethuba logqabhuko dubulo. Akukho mntu owayengaphakathi kwindlu. Ngela xesha, abahlali abasondele ku-100 baye bakhutshwa kuloo ngingqi
mt: 1 person was killed and 4 were injured when a house in Macbeth exploded. The explosion was caused by a gas leak. The explosion occurred after a resident had lit a cigarette. The house was destroyed. 4 people were taken to hospital with minor injuries. No one was inside the house at the time. 100 people were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Ababhubhileyo nguNicholas Alden, 25, kunye noZachary Cuddeback, 21. UCuddeback wayekade eqhuba. U-Edgar Verguilla wafumana amanxeba kwingalo nomhlathi ngelixa uKristofer Schneider washiyeka edinga utyando lokubumbha ubuso bakhe. Isixhobo sikaUka sayeka ukusebenza ngoxa wayesijongise kwintloko yendoda yesihlanu. USchneider unentlungu eqhubekayo, akaboni ngeliso elinye, akanayo inxalenye yokakayi kwaye unobuso obenziwe nge-titanium. USchneider unikele ubungqina ngelinki yevidiyo ekwiUSAF ekummandla wakokwabo.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the pilot. Edgar Verguilla was injured when Kristofer Schneider crashed into him. Schneider was ejected from the cockpit of the fifth plane. Schneider was the co-pilot, had a previous crash, had a previous injury, and had titanium rods in his legs. Schneider was killed in the crash.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Umbhoxo kunye negalufa zombini ziza kubuyela kwimidlalo yee-Olimpiki. Kwintlanganiso ebibanjelwe eBerlin namhlanje, ibhodi yolawulo lwe-International Olympic Committee ivotele ukuyifaka loo midlalo. Umbhoxo, ngokungqalileyo, umbhoxo odlalwa kwiligi kunye negalufa ziye zakhethwa ngaphezu kweminye imidlalo emihlanu ebihlolwa ukuba ingathatha inxaxheba kwii-Olimpiki. Imidlalo ye-squash, ikarati kunye ne-roller izamile ukungena kwinkqubo ye-Olimpiki kunye ne-baseball kunye ne-softball, eyavotelwa ukuba iphume kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki ngo-2005. Ivoti kusafuneka iqinisekiswe yi-IOC epheleleyo kwintlanganiso yayo ngo-Oktobha eCopenhagen.
mt: 2 sports are set to return to the Olympics. At a meeting in Berlin today, the International Olympic Committee voted to reinstate the sports. The sports, both of which were dropped from the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, will be added to the 2008 Beijing Games. Squash, karate and roller hockey were all dropped from the Olympics in 1992. Baseball and softball were voted out of the Olympics in 2005. The IOC will make a final decision on the sports at its meeting in Copenhagen in October.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: NgoSeptemba 24, 1759, uArthur Guinness watyikitya isivumelwano sokuqesha iSt James Gate Brewery eDublin, e-Ireland kangangeminyaka eyi-9000. Emva kweminyaka engama-250, iGuinness ikhule yaya kwishishini lehlabathi elenza ngaphezulu kwe-10 yezigidi zeYuro (i-US $ 14.7 yezigidi) minyaka le.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease on the St James Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. After 250 years, Guinness is still the top-selling beer in Ireland, with sales of over $14.7 million in 2009.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Uxinzelelo lomkhuhlane weentaka obulala abantu, i-H5N1, uqinisekisiwe ukuba wosulele idada lasendle elifileyo, elifunyenwe ngoMvulo, kumgxobhozo kufutshane naseLyon kwimpuma yeFrance. IFransi ililizwe lesixhenxe kwinyunyani yase Europe ebethakele kulentsholongwane; kulandele I Austria, Germany,Slovenia,Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Azikaqinisekiswa iingxelozokubakho kwesigulo se-H5N1 eCroatia naseDenmark.
mt: The H5N1 virus, which has killed 60 people, was confirmed to have spread to a new country, France, on Monday, in a bird flu outbreak in the south-east of the country. France is the first European country to be affected; others at risk are Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. The H5N1 virus has also been confirmed in Croatia and Denmark.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

mt: The H5N1 virus, which has killed 60 people, was confirmed to have spread to a new country, France, on Monday, in a bird flu outbreak in the south-east of the country. France is the first European country to be affected; others at risk are Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. The H5N1 virus has also been confirmed in Croatia and Denmark.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Abagcini boxolo be-UN, abafike e-Haiti emva kwenyikima yango-2010, batyholwa ngokosulelwano kwesifo esaqala ngakwinkampu yeqela labo. Ngokutsho kwebango, inkunkuma evela kwinkampu ye-UN ibingacocwanga kakuhle, yaze loo nto yabangela ukuba iintsholongwane zingene kumlambo i-Artibonite, omnye wemilambo emikhulu eHaiti. Phambi kokufika kwemikhosi, iHaiti yayingazange idibane neengxaki ezifana nesi sifo ukusukela nge-1800s. I-Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy ibhekise izifundo zayo ezizimeleyo ezibonisa ukuba i-Nepalese UN yokhuseleko egcina uxolo ize nesisifo e-Haiti. UDanielle Lantagne, ingcali ye-UN kwizzifo, uchaze wathi uqhambuko kusenokwenzwka ukuba lubangelwe ngabagadi boxolo.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake survivors, who arrived in Haiti after the disaster, are being treated for a new disease. According to reports, the disease is spreading in the Artibonite, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before the arrival of the UN troops, Haiti had not been exposed to diseases such as this since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has published a study showing that the Nepalese UN peacekeepers are responsible for the disease. UN expert Danielle Lantagne said the disease is spreading because of the troops' poor hygiene.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Urhulumente waseIreland ugxininisa into yokungxamiseka komthetho wasepalamente oza kulungisa le meko. ""Ibalulekile ngoku ukuvela kwiliso lempilo yomphakathi nakwiliso lobukrelemnqa ukuba umgaqo siseko efakwe emthethweni ngokungxamiseka,"" latsho igosa likarhulumente. UMphathiswa wezeMpilo uvakalise inkxalabo kokubini ngentlalo-ntle yabantu abaxhamla ithuba lokuba semthethweni kwezi zinto, kunye nezigwebo eziwisiweyo ezimayela neziyobisi ekubeni olu tshintsho lungahambisani nomgaqo-siseko luqalisile."
mt: "The Irish government has announced a review of the parliamentary process that led to the legislation. ""It is important that the public and the media have confidence in the process by which legislation is passed,"" the government statement said. The health minister said the review would look at the role of the public and the media in ensuring that legislation is properly scrutinised."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "UChristopher Garcia, isithethi Sesebe Lezamapolisa eLos Angeles, uthe umrhanelwa oyindoda uphandelwa ukungena ngaphandle kwemvume endaweni yokonakalisa impahla. Uphawu lwalungonakalanga ngokwembonakalo; uhlengahlengiso lwenziwe kusetyenziswa iiseyile ezimnyama ezihonjiswe ngeempawu zoxolo nentliziyo ukuguqula u ""O"" ukuba afunde oonobumba abancinci ""e""."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a Los Angeles police spokesman, said the suspect was a male who was arrested for trespassing on the property. The body was found in a drainage ditch; the investigation is being conducted by the coroner's office to determine whether the ""O"" was a homicide or a suicide."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: UKarno ngumfundisi wesiNgesi owaziwayo kodwa owabangela imbambano owayefundisa phantsi kwe-Modern Education kunye ne-King's Glory owabanga ngokuthi wayenabafundi abayi-9,000 kwincopho yokusebenza kwakhe. Kumanqaku akhe, wasebenzisa amagama ajongwa njengakrwada ngabanye abazali, yaye waysebenzisa izithuko ngokufuthi eklasini. I-Mordern Education zimtyhola ngokushicilela izibhengezo ezinkulu kwiibhasi ngaphandle kwemvume nokuxoka ngelithi ungumkhokeli oyintloko wabafundisa isiNgesi. Ebekhe watyholwa ngokunyhasha ilungelo lombhali lokuthengisa nokushicilela umsebenzi wakhe, kodwa zange abekwe tyala. Owayesakuba ngumfundi uthe âwayesebenzisa intetho engaphucukanga eklasini, ecebisa ngokuthandana, yaye wayeba ngathi ngumhlobo kubafundi bakhe.â
mt: 1. A well-known American teacher who taught in a private school in Thailand was arrested for having sex with a student. He used the name âKrwadaâ among his friends, and used the nickname âTeacherâ in the classroom. The Modern Education school was closed for a week after the teacher was arrested for having sex with a student. He was not charged with any crime, but was fired. He said he used a fake name in the classroom, and was a teacher to his students.â
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Owayelipolisa oli-Filipino ugcine uthathe abahambi base-Hong Kong njengamabanjwa sakhe ngokuhlasela ibhasi yabo e-Manila, ikomkhulu le-Philippines URolando Mendoza wadubula umpu wakhe iM16 kubakhenkethi. Baliqela abathinjwa esele behlanguliwe kwaye ubuncinci bathandathu selebefile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku. Ukubanjwa ngobhongwana izihlandlo ezithandathu, kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala, baye bakhululwa kwwangethuba, ngokunjalo nabafoti base Filipino. Abafoti bathabatha indawo yenenekazi esele likhulile njengoko lalifuna ilondolo. UMendoza wadutyulwa.
mt: A Filipino policeman shot dead two Hong Kong visitors and wounded three others in a Manila hotel, police said. Rolando Mendoza, a former police officer, opened fire with an M16 rifle at the tourists, who were on a Philippine tour, police said. The tourists were rushed to hospital, where they were declared dead. Three children and two adults were also wounded, police said. The children were later airlifted to a hospital in Manila. The tourists were staying in a room on the 10th floor of the hotel, which was cordoned off by police. Mendoza was arrested.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: I-Brazil lelona lizwe linenkolo yamaRoma Katolika Emhlabeni, yaye icawa yamaRoma Katolika ibingagungqi ekuphikiseni ukwenziwa kube semthethweni ukutshata kwabantu besini esinye. I-National Congres yaseBrazil iphikisene nokugunyaziswa iminyaka eli-10, kangangokuba imitshato yempepha isemthethweni kuphela eRio Grande do Sul. Ibill yakuqala yayisulungwe ngowayeaskuba yi mayor yaseSÃ£o Paulo, uMarta Suplicy. Umthetho ocetywayo emveni kokuba utshintshiwe, ngoku usezzandleni zikaRoberto Jefferson. Ababhikishi banethemba lokuqokelela ipetishini eziyi 1.2 lezigidi zentsayino ukuze bazizise kwi National Congress Ku Novemba.
mt: 1.2 million signatures are needed to get a bill on the floor of the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of SÃ£o Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Emizuzwini emihlanu izibonakalisile umoya waqala ukuvuthuza,emva komzuzu, umoya wabe sele ufikelela I 70km/hâ¦ kwaze kwalandela imvula, yabe irhabaxa inkulu kangangokuqa ikuqhwabe esikhumbeni okwenaliti, emva koko kweza isichotho samatye esiwa esibhakabhakeni, abantu besoyika futhi bekhwaza yaye bebaleka omnye phezu komnye. Ndalahlekelwa ngudadewethu netshomi yake, endleleni yam kwaye kukho abantu ababini abakhubazekileyo bekwizitulo zamavili, abantu nje betsiba ngapha kwabo yake bebathyiliza,"" utshilo uArmand Versace."
mt: 5 minutes after the first lightning strike, the wind started to pick up, after the storm, the wind was blowing at 70km/hâ¦ the rain was heavy, then the wind picked up and started to blow towards the city, after that the storm hit the city, people were injured and some were trapped on the roofs of their houses. My father and his wife were injured, they were taken to the hospital and two people were killed, some people were injured," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Isichotho , esimalunga ne 645 miles (1040 km) e entshona ye-Cape Verde islands, sesenokuphelelwa singekoyikisi ngokufika kwezinye indawo zomhlaba, batsho abengcali zemozulu. IFred unomoya oyi-105 ngeyure (165km/h) kwaye ubheka ngasemantla ntshona. UFred yeyona nkanyamba inamandla eyakha yakho emzantsi nasempuma Atlantic ukuza kuthi ga ngoku ukususela oko kwabakho imifanekiso ye-satelite, yinkqwithela enkulu yesithathu ezimbalini kwimpuma 35Â°W.
mt: 645 miles (1040 km) east of the Cape Verde islands, the storm is expected to move away from land, but is still a threat to the Azores. Fred is a Category 1 hurricane with winds of 105 mph (165km/h) and is moving north. Fred is the third hurricane in the Atlantic this year, and is a large storm with a 35Â°W longitude.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35Â°W.

src: I-802.11n linqanaba elisebenza ku-2.4Ghz naku-5.0Ghz yefrikwensi Oku kuza kwenza ukuba isebenzisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b kunye ne-802.11g, logama nje isitishi esisiseko sineeradiyo ezimbini. Isantya se-802.11n sikhawuleze kakhulu kunesabangaphambili abaphumeleleyo be-600Mbit / s.
mt: 802.11n operates in both the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequency bands, allowing it to coexist with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g networks. The 802.11n standard is expected to increase the maximum data rate to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Umphumeleli wembasa yegolide yeOlimpiki bekufanele ukuba ibidada kwi-100m kunye ne-200m freestyle nakwimidlalo emithathu edluliselwe kwiMidlalo yeCommonwealth, kodwa ngenxa yezikhalazo zakhe ukomelela kwakhe bekuthandabuzekile. Khange akwazi ukuthatha amachiza afunekayo ukoyisa iintlungu njengoko zivaliwe kwimidlalo.
mt: 100m and 200m freestyle swimmer, who was also a Commonwealth Games medallist, was forced to withdraw from the Commonwealth Games due to injury. He was unable to take the painkillers he was prescribed due to the side effects.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Imephu ye nyikimo lomhlaba yeUnited States Geological Survey zange ibonise zinyikima eIceland kwiveki eyayiphambi kwaleyo. IOfisi ye-Meteorologyyase Iceland ixele ukuba khange kubekho nyikima kwindawo yaseHekla kwiiyure ezingama-48 ezidlulileyo. Intshukumo enkulu yenyikima ibangelwe lutshintsho lwesigaba wenzeke nge-10 ka-Matshi kwicala elingasemantla mpuma lwengqungquthela ye-volikheyino. Kubekho ingxelo yokuba kukho amafu amfiliba angenanto yakwenza nokuqhambuka kwentaba-mlilo asemazantsi entaba. Amafu abonisa amandla okubhideka ukuba ngaba uphazamiseko lwenzekile ngokwenene.
mt: 2010 EyjafjallajÃ¶kull eruption
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Imephu ye nyikimo lomhlaba yeUnited States Geological Survey zange ibonise zinyikima eIceland kwiveki eyayiphambi kwaleyo. IOfisi ye-Meteorologyyase Iceland ixele ukuba khange kubekho nyikima kwindawo yaseHekla kwiiyure ezingama-48 ezidlulileyo. Intshukumo enkulu yenyikima ibangelwe lutshintsho lwesigaba wenzeke nge-10 ka-Matshi kwicala elingasemantla mpuma lwengqungquthela ye-volikheyino. Kubekho ingxelo yokuba kukho amafu amfiliba angenanto yakwenza nokuqhambuka kwentaba-mlilo asemazantsi entaba. Amafu abonisa amandla okubhideka ukuba ngaba uphazamiseko lwenzekile ngokwenene.

src: Inqwelo yasemajukujukwini engena mqhubi iChandrayaan-1 iye yakhupha Isixhobo sayo Sokuhlola Inyanga (MIP), esiye sabaleka Enyangeni sihamba ngesantya seekhilomitha eziyi-1.5 (I-3000 yeemayile ngeyure) ngomzuzwana, yaye siye sawa ngempumelelo kwi-south pole yaseNyangeni. Ngaphandle kokulayisha izixhobo zesayensi ezibalulekileyo, i-lunar probe yayilayishe nomfanekiso weflegi yelizwe lase-Indiya owawupeyntwe macala onke.
mt: 1.5 km (3,000 ft) above the lunar surface, the Chandrayaan-1 spacecraft, which had been orbiting the moon since November, flew over the south pole of the moon. The lunar probe was carrying a scientific instrument that was expected to provide a map of the moon's surface.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Inqwelo yasemajukujukwini engena mqhubi iChandrayaan-1 iye yakhupha Isixhobo sayo Sokuhlola Inyanga (MIP), esiye sabaleka Enyangeni sihamba ngesantya seekhilomitha eziyi-1.5 (I-3000 yeemayile ngeyure) ngomzuzwana, yaye siye sawa ngempumelelo kwi-south pole yaseNyangeni. Ngaphandle kokulayisha izixhobo zesayensi ezibalulekileyo, i-lunar probe yayilayishe nomfanekiso weflegi yelizwe lase-Indiya owawupeyntwe macala onke.
mt: 1.5 km (3,000 ft) above the lunar surface, the Chandrayaan-1 spacecraft, which had been orbiting the moon since November, flew over the south pole of the moon. The lunar probe was carrying a scientific instrument that was expected to provide a map of the moon's surface.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Abantu bokuqala ukosulelwa sesi sifo kweli xesha lonyaka baxelwe ngasekuphelni kwenyanga yeKhala. Esi sifo sithwalwa ziihagu, size emva koko sifudukele ebantwini singena ngeengcongconi. Ukugqbhuka kwesifo kuye kwabangela ukuba urhulumente wase-Indiya athathe amanyathelo afana nokuthunyelwa kwababambisi beehagu kwiindawo ezichaphazeleke kakhulu, esasaza amawaka amakhethini eengcongconi kunye nokutshiza i-pesticides. Izigidi ezininzi zeebhotile zokuthintela isifo se-encephalitis nazo zithenjisiwe ngurhulumente, eziza kunceda ekulungiseleleni iiarhente zempilo zonyaka olandelayo. Izicwangciso zokuhanjiswa kwezitofu kwiindawo ezazichaphazeleke kakhulu kulo nyaka zacothiswa ngenxa yokunqongophala kwemali kunye nokubekwa phambili ngokubaluleka kwezinye izifo.
mt: 2016 was the first year in which the disease was reported in the winter. The disease is usually reported in the summer. The outbreak was caused by the government's failure to provide adequate health care to the poor, who are often exposed to pesticides and other toxins. The government has been criticized for its failure to provide adequate health care to the poor, who are often exposed to pesticides and other toxins.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Utshintsho olucetywayo sele lwapasiswa zizo zombini izindlu zowiso mthetho ngo-2011. Utshintsho luye lwenziwa kwixesha lokuhlala kwezindlu zowiso mthetho xa isivakalisi sesibini siye saqala sacinywa Yindlu Yabameli kwaza emva koko Indlu Yeengwevu yavota ngendlela efanayo ngoMvulo. Ukungaphumeleli kwesigwebo sesibini, esiphakamisa ukuvala imitshato yabesini esinye, inokuvula umnyango kwimitshato yabantu besini esifanayou kwixesha elizayo. Emva kwenkqubo, i HJR-3 iza kuhlolwa kwakhona ngamalungu amatsha epalamente ngo-2015 okanye ngo-2016 ukuzeiqhubeke ikwinkqubo.
mt: 2011 saw the passage of two bills. The first, passed in the first session, was the American Jobs Act, which created the American Jobs Act Trust Fund, which was to be funded by a 3.6% tax on all financial transactions. The second, passed in the second session, was the HJR-3, which would have amended the Constitution to allow the federal government to tax all financial transactions, but was vetoed by the President in 2015 or 2016 to prevent the bill from becoming law.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Amaphepha e-Panama"" sisiquko sempepha ezingangezigidi eziyilishumi ezivela kwezomthetho zase-Panama i-Mossack Fonseca, eziphuncikileyo kwababhala bephepha ndaba ngewntwasa hlobo ka-2016. Amaxwebhu abonise ukuba iibhanki ezilishumi elinesine zincede abaxumi abanemali ukufihla iidola ezizibhiliyon zaseMerika ukuze ziphephe imithetho yerhafu neminye. Iphepha laseBritane iGuardian linonakale lisithi iDeutsche Bank ilawule pha kwi sthathu seenkampani ezingasebenziyo eziyi 1200 ukuphumelelisa lento. Bekukho uqhankqalazo kwihlabathi lonke, ukutshutshiswa ngokusemthethweni, yaye iinkokheli zoorhulumente base-Iceland nasePakistan bobabini barhoxile elulawulweni."
mt: """The Panama Papers"" is a series of documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked in April 2016. The documents detail financial transactions and shell companies of 12,000 clients, including politicians, celebrities, and business leaders. The British newspaper The Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank was involved in the creation of 1,200 shell companies for clients. The leak has been described as a "global scandal", with the media and governments around the world investigating the documents.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Iingozi zomoya zixhaphakile eIran, enezithuthi ezindala ezingagcinwanga kakuhle kwimisebenzi yoluntu neyomkhosi. Isohlwayo samanye amazwe sithethe ukuba inqwelo moya entsha ayinakuthengwa. Ekuqaleni kwaleveki, inqwelontaka yamapolisa iwe yabulala abantu abathathu yonzakalisa abanye abathathu. Kwinyanga ephelileyo i-Iran ibone eyona ntlekele inkulu yomoya kwiminyaka eyadlulayo xa inqwelo moya eyayisiya eArmenia yaphazamiseka, yabulala abali-168 ababekhwele kuyo. Kulonyanga iphinde yabona enye inqwelo moya iphosa umgaqo wayo e-Mashhad kwaye yayshayisa idonga kwasweleka ishumi elinesixhenxe.
mt: 1. A plane crashed in Iran, killing 66 people, including members of the military and medical staff. Some countries have reported that the plane was not shot down. In the beginning of the crash, the police plane killed three people and injured others. Last year, Iran saw a plane crash that killed 168 people, which was shot down by the U.S. military. In the same year, it also saw a plane crash in Mashhad, killing 66 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Iqela Lemfundo lase-Iraq likhuphe ingxelo yalo ngo-12.00 GMT namhlanje. Ilumkisa ngokuba akukho mntu onokuqiniseka ukuba nantoni na eyenziwayo ngoku eIraq iza kwazi ukuphelisa ukulwa kwamahlelo, ubudlobongela obandayo, ukukweyela ebugxwayibeni. Ingxelo iqala ngesicelo sokuba kuthethwe phandle nokuba kuvanwe eMerika malunga ngepolisi yoMbindi Mpuma. Lengxelo ibalileke kakhulu ngandlela zonke zepolisi ekhoyo yabongameleyo e Iraq kwaye inyanzelisa utshintsho olukhawulezileyo. Okokuqala kula78 yeengcebiso yinto yokuba ingxaxheba entsha yoonoozakuzaku funeke uqalisiwe pambhi kokuba kuphele lonyaka ukwenzela ukukhusela izwe nomhlaba weIraq ekuphazamisekeni ngodlame futhi nokulungisa iintetho zoonoozakuzaku namazwe asondeleyo.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi government announced that there is no evidence of a terrorist attack in Iraq, no casualties, no damage to the airport. The statement began with the request that the matter be discussed outside the United States and the FBI. The statement was largely ignored by all the police forces in Iraq and the investigation is ongoing. The first 78 of the 80 questions were answered that the bomb was recently planted and that the statement was made to create fear in Iraq and the world.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraqâs borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Ngokuka-Ansa, ""amapolisa abenexhala lokubetha okuphezulu benoloyiko lokuba bangarhwebeshela bemfazwe. Amapolisa athi uLo Piccolo wayenamandla ngenxa yokuba waysisandla sika Provenzano ePalermo kwaye amava akhe amzuzela imbeko yesizukulwana esidala sabaphathi njengoko babelandela umgaqo-nkqubo kaProvenzano wokuzifihla kangangoko kuba besaqinisa amandla enetwekhi. Aba baphathi babaphantsi kolawulo lukaProvenzano xa waphelisa imfazwe ekhokhelwa yi-Rina nxamnye nephondo elabulala amajoni eMafia uGiovanni Falcone kunye noPaolo Borsellino ngo-1992."""
mt: "According to Ansa, police sources say the attack was carried out by the Mafia. The police say that Lo Piccolo is in charge of the Palermo area and that his men are responsible for the murder of the Mafia bosses Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Umdlali wejudoka uHitoshi Saito waseJapan, owaphumelela iimbasa ezimbini zegolide kwii-Olimpiki uye wasweleka eneminyaka eyi-54. Unobangela wokufa wachazwa ukuba ngumhlaza we-intrahepatic bile duct. Usweleke e-Osaka ngoLwesibini. Ukongezelela ekubeni yintshtsheli yeHlabathi neyee-Olympics, ngexesha lokufa kwakhe uSaito ebengusihlalo wekomiti yokuqeqesha kwi-All Japan Judo Federation.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judo master Hitoshi Saito, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died of liver cancer. He died in Osaka on Sunday. He was a member of the All Japan Judo Federation's committee to select Olympic athletes.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Ehambhweni lwakhe, u-Iwasaki wadibana neengxaki kwamaxesha amaninzi. Wakhuthuzwa zi-pirates, wahlaselwa eTibet yinja enomgada, wabaleka umtshato eNepal waya kubanjwa eIndiya.
mt: 1. His plane was hijacked by pirates, taken to Tibet, and then to Nepal, where he was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: UGiancarlo Fisichella waphulukana nokulawula imoto yakhe yaye waphuma kumdyarho kamsinya emva kokuba uqalile. Umdlali weqela lakhe u Fernando Alonso wayekhokhele ebudeni bomdyarho, kodwa wayeka nje ukuba ipiy yakhe ime, mhlawumbe kungenxa yokuba ivili lalibotshwe kakubi. UMichael Schumacher wayigqiba ireyisi yakhe kungakudalanga kakhulu emva ko Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokuyekiswa namadabi amaninzi ngelixa lereyisi.
mt: 2009 Formula One champion Giancarlo Fisichella was disqualified from the race after he was found to have been driving a car that was not legal. His team mate Fernando Alonso was also disqualified, but only because his car was not ready. Michael Schumacher was disqualified for having a car that was too fast, after Alonso's car was found to be illegal.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: UGiancarlo Fisichella waphulukana nokulawula imoto yakhe yaye waphuma kumdyarho kamsinya emva kokuba uqalile. Umdlali weqela lakhe u Fernando Alonso wayekhokhele ebudeni bomdyarho, kodwa wayeka nje ukuba ipiy yakhe ime, mhlawumbe kungenxa yokuba ivili lalibotshwe kakubi. UMichael Schumacher wayigqiba ireyisi yakhe kungakudalanga kakhulu emva ko Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokuyekiswa namadabi amaninzi ngelixa lereyisi.
mt: 2009 Formula One champion Giancarlo Fisichella was disqualified from the race after he was found to have been driving a car that was not legal. Michael Schumacher was disqualified for having a car that was too fast, after Alonso's car was found to be illegal.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Kwezi nyanga ziyi-3 zidlulileyo, kukhululwe amabanjwa angaphezu kwe-80 kwindawo ye-Central Booking bengatyholwanga ngokusemthethweni. Ngo-Epreli kulo nyaka, iJaji uGlynn wakhupha umyalelo wokubambisa okwexeshana ngokuchasene nesibonelelo sokunyanzelisa ukukhululwa kwabo babebanjwe ngaphezulu kweeyure ezingama-24 emva kokungeniswa kwabo abangakhange ityala labo lixoxwe ngumphathi wenkundla. Umkomishana nguye obeka ibheyile, ukuba uyifumene, agunyazise izithyolo ezifayilwe lipolisa elibambayo.Izithyolo ziye ke zingeniswe kwisystem yekompyutha karhulumente apho ityala lithi lilandelelwe. Ukumamelwa kwetyala kuphawula umhla welungelo lomrhanelwa kwityala elikhawulezileyo
mt: 3 years ago, 80 suspects were arrested at the Central Booking, which was closed due to a fire. In April of this year, Judge Glynn ordered the release of the suspects who had not been arraigned within 24 hours of their arrest. The judge also ordered the destruction of the records. The records were destroyed, the judge said, because they were found to be unreliable. The records were stored on a computer system, which the judge said was unreliable.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspectâs right to a speedy trial.

src: U Lodin uphinde wathi amagosa agqibe ekubeni arhoxise ukhuphiswano ukuze asindise ama Afghani kwiindleko nokhuseleko lolunye ulwanyulo. Oonozakuzaku bathe sebefumane ubungqangi kumgaqo-siseko waseAfghan obaneleyo ukuba bangagxeka intlelo-khuphiswano yezepolitki. Oku kuyaphikisana neengxelo zangaphambili ebezithe ukurhoxisa unyulo lwesibini kungaba nxamnye nomgaqo siseko.
mt: 1. Lodin said the Taliban were trying to negotiate a ceasefire to avoid further bloodshed. Afghan officials have denied any political negotiations with the Taliban. This is in line with previous statements that the Taliban were trying to negotiate a ceasefire with the government.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Ukusukela kwinkululeko yasePakistan kulawulo lwaseBritane ngo-1947, uMongameli wasePakistan wonyule ""ii-Arhente zoPolitiko"" ukuba zilawule i-FATA, zisebenzisa ulawulo oluzimeleyo olusondeleyo lokulawula iindawo. La magosa anembopheleleko yokunikezela ngeenkonzo zezomthetho nezoburhulumente phantsi kweGatya 247 Lomgaqo siseko wasePakistan."
mt: 1947, the British Prime Minister said that the "political agents" would administer the FATA, using a "light touch" approach to governance. The law has been criticized for its lack of transparency and accountability under the 247th Article of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Imuvi, ekudlala kuyo uRyan Gosling no-Emma Stone, iye yanconyelwa imbasa kuzo zonke iikhathegori eziyintloko. UGosling kunye no-Stone batyunjwe ngengabadlali beqonga ababalaseleyo ngokulandelelana. Amanye amagama atyunjiweyo abandakanya uMfanekiso oGqwesileyo, uMlawuli, iCinematografi, uyilo lweempahla, ukuhlelwa kwefilimu, Amanqaku oqobo, uyilo lweMveliso, ukuHlela kwesandi, ukuXuba isandi kunye nokuDlala ngokuQala. IIngoma ezimbini zemuvi, iAudition (The Fools Who Dream) kunye neCity of Stars, zifumene ukunconywa ngeyona ngoma iphambili kweziyilwe ukususela ekuqaleni. iLionsgate studio ifumene uncomelo oluyi-26o - ngaphezulu kwayo nayiphi na enye studiyo.
mt: 2016's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for all 14 of its eligible categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for their lead performances. Other nominees included Best Actor in a Leading Role, Best Actor in a Supporting Role, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Director, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, Best Visual Effects, and Best Writing (Original Screenplay). The film's two original songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate studio was nominated for 26 films - more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations â more than any other studio.

src: I-NHK ichaze ukuba i-Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant eseNiigata prefecture isebenza kakuhle. I-Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ayichazanga miphumela ebangelwe yinyikima nokuba Inombolo-1 neye-2 ye-reactors eShika nuclearpower plant ziye zavalwa. Kuchazwe ukuba amakhaya ayi 9400 kwingingqi awanamanzi nali 100 awanambane. Ezinye iindlela zonakalisiwe, inkonzo kaloliwe iphazamisekile kwiindawo ezichaphazelekayo, kwaye iNoto Airport eIshikawa prefecture ihleli ivaliwe.
mt: NHK reports that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture is operating normally.  The Hokuriku Electric Power Co. has reported that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Shika nuclearpower plant have been shut down.  It is reported that about 9,400 people in the area have been evacuated, and about 100 people have been injured.  Some roads are closed, and the evacuation area has been expanded.  The Ishikawa prefecture Noto Airport has been closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Uxwebhu,ngokutsho,kokuhletyiweyo kuyakubhekisa kwingxabano zebhoda, efunwa ngama Palestine ebhekiselele kwiibhoda zamgaphambi kwemfazwe ka1967 yase Mideast . Ezinye izihloko ekuthethwa ngazo zibandakanya imeko yexesha elizayo yeYerusalem engcwele kuzo zombini izizwe nakwi yeJordani Valley. I-Israel ifuna ubukho obuqhubekayo emkhosini ethafeni kangangeminyaka elishumi emva kokuba isivumelwano sisayiniwe ngelixa i-PA ivumayo ukushiya ubukho obunjalo iminyaka emihlanu kuphela.
mt: 1. The conflict is over the control of the holy sites, which are claimed by both the Palestinians and the Israelis. The sites include the Temple Mount and the Western Wall in Jerusalem, and the Jordan Valley. Israel wants to maintain control of the sites for at least 50 years after the peace agreement is signed, which the PA has agreed to only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Uzalelwe e Hong Kong, u Ma ufunde kwidyunivesithi yase New York nase Harvad Law School wakhe wanayo nemvume yokuba ngummi opheleleyo waseMelika ene âgreen cardâ. Ngexesha lonyulo, uHsieh ube ngathi uthi uMa angaqhwesha emke kwelo lizwe ngexesha lobunzima. uHsieh uphinde waxoxa ukuba uMa ophuma kakuhle zifotweni unesitayile ngaphezu kobuntu. Nangona bekukho ezi zityholo, okaMa uphumelele kakhulu egaya inkxaso ngokukhuthaza ukusebenza ngokusondeleyo kunye nemimandla yeTshayina.
mt: 1. Hsieh, a native of Hong Kong, is a graduate of New York University and Harvard Law School and is a âgreen cardâ holder. At the time of the incident, Hsieh said he believed Ma was not allowed to enter the country during the pandemic. Hsieh also said Ma was able to leave the country without a problem. However, there are some discrepancies, Ma was able to leave the country with a valid visa.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Emva kokuba iye yacaca ukuba iintsapho ezininzi bezidinga uncedo ngokwezomthetho ukuzwe zilwe ukugxothwa kwazo, kubanjwe intlanganiso nge-20 kweyoKwindla e-Bay East Community Law Centeryamaxhoba obuqhetseba. Xa abahlali beqala ukubalisa ukuba behlelwe yintoni, uninzi lweentsapho ebezikho zivele zqaphela ukuba uCarolyn Wilson wase-OHA uyibile iimali yazo yedipozithi, waza wemka kuloo dolophu. Abahlali baseLockwood Gardens bakholelwa ukuba bekunamasapho ayi-40 okanye angaphakoko anogxothwa, ukuba bevile amapolisa e-OHA aphanda ezinye iindawo zokuhlala e-Oakland abanobhaqwa kwamaqhinga endawo zokuhlala.
mt: 20 of the 40 people who were displaced by the fire have been relocated to the Bay East Community Law Center. When the residents first arrived, many of the displaced residents were upset that Carolyn Wilson of OHA was not present at the scene. Residents of Lockwood Gardens were told that 40 of their homes were damaged or destroyed, and that OHA police were at other Oakland housing developments.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Emva komdyarho, uKeselowski usakhokhela Kubuntshatsheli Babaqhubi ngamanqaku ayi-2,250. Ngamanqaku asixhenxe ngemva, uJohnson ungowesibini enama- 2,243. Kwindawo yesithathu, nguHamlin ongasemva ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini, kudwa uphambili kuBowyer ngamahlanu. UKahne kunye noTruex, Jr. babambe indawo yesihlanu neyesithandathu ngokulandelelana kwabo ngamanqaku ayi-2,220 nayi-2,207. UStewart, uGordon, uKenseth, kunye noHarvick bathatha izithuba ezilishumi eziphezulu ze-Championship zabaqhubi kusasele imidyarho emine enyakeni.
mt: 1. Keselowski won the pole with a lap of 2:25.0. 2. Johnson was second with a lap of 2:25.3. 3. Hamlin was third with a lap of 2:26.4. 4. Bowyer was fourth with a lap of 2:27.5. 5. Kahne and Truex, Jr. were tied for fifth with laps of 2:27.6 and 2:27.7. 6. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick were tied for seventh with laps of 2:27.8.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Esi siganeko kukholeleka ukuba sisihlandlo sesihlanu kwimbali apho abantu beye babona izinto ezinemichiza zisiwa eMhlabeni. Kuwo onke amatye amalunga ne-24,000 aziwayo awele Emhlabeni evela emajukujukwini, amalunga ne-34 kuphela aye aqinisekiswe njengavela e-Mars. Amatye ayi-15 ezi meteorite awe ngoJulayi kunyaka ophelileyo. Amanye amatye, anqabe kakhulu Emhlabeni, athengiswa ngemali eqala kwi-US$11,000 ukuya kutsho kwi-$22,500 igram, oku kuxabisa ngokuphindwe kalishumi kunegolide.
mt: 24,000 meteorites have been found in the area, 34 of which are confirmed to be from Mars. 15 meteorites were found in July. The most valuable, which weighs 1.5 grams, is valued at $11,000 to $22,500 per gram, making it the most expensive rock in the world.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Esi siganeko kukholeleka ukuba sisihlandlo sesihlanu kwimbali apho abantu beye babona izinto ezinemichiza zisiwa eMhlabeni. Kuwo onke amatye amalunga ne-24,000 aziwayo awele Emhlabeni evela emajukujukwini, amalunga ne-34 kuphela aye aqinisekiswe njengavela e-Mars. Amatye ayi-15 ezi meteorite awe ngoJulayi kunyaka ophelileyo. Amanye amatye, anqabe kakhulu Emhlabeni, athengiswa ngemali eqala kwi-US$11,000 ukuya kutsho kwi-$22,500 igram, oku kuxabisa ngokuphindwe kalishumi kunegolide.
mt: 24,000 meteorites have been found in the area, 34 of which are confirmed to be from Mars. 15 meteorites were found in July. The most valuable, which weighs 1.5 grams, is valued at $11,000 to $22,500 per gram, making it the most expensive rock in the world.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: USchumacher owayethathe umhlala-phantsi ngo-2006 emva kokuphumelela ubuntshatsheli beFomula 1 amatyeli asixhenxe, wayelindeleke ukuba abambele uFelipe Massa owonzakeleyo. Lo waseBrazili ufumene umenzakalo omkhulu entloko emveni kwengozi yeHungarian Grand Prix ka-2009. I-UMassa iuza kuyekiswa unyaka wonke ka-2009 wesizini.
mt: 2006 champion Michael Schumacher was disqualified from the 2005 Hungarian Grand Prix after a post-race investigation. Massa was given a one-year ban from the sport in 2009 after a race-fixing scandal.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku i-AOL ibikade ikwazi ukuvelisa iwebhusayithi ye-IM ingaqhutywa nto ngenxa yokuba ibisetyenziswa ngokubanzi eUnited States. Ngesisicwangciso sibekiweyo, le nkululeko ingaphela. Amanani labasebenzisi beenkonzo ze-Yahoo! kunye ne-Microsoft edibene azophikisana nenani labsebenzisi be-AOL.
mt: AOL is unable to provide IM service in the United States due to a court order. The injunction is in effect. Yahoo! and Microsoft are working to provide service to AOL users.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Ibhombu yemoto eqhume kwikomkhulu lamapolisa eGaziantep, eTurkey ngentseni izolo ibulale amapolisa amabini kwaye yenzakalise abantu abangaphezulu kwamashumi amabini. I-ofisi yerhuluneli ithe abalishumi elinethoba kwabonzakeleyo ngamapolisa. Amapolisa athi arhanela ugqirha we-Daesh (ISIL) otyholwa ngohlaselo.
mt: 11 police officers were killed and 36 injured in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey on Sunday. The police headquarters was hit by the bomb. Police say they have killed a Daesh (ISIL) suicide bomber.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Owayesakuba yirhuluneli yaseMassachusetts uMitt Romney uphumelele unyulo lwe-Florida Republican Party ngolo nyulo lokuba ngumongameli ngolwesibini nge-46 yepesenti yevoti. Owayekubasisithethi kwi-U.S House, uNewt Gingrich uphume kwindawo yesibini ngo-32 pesenti. Njengoko ophumelelayo ethabatha izixeko zonke, i-Florida inikeze amashumi amahlanu abameli bayo ku Romney, bemthyalela ngentla njengosekuqaleni umnyulwa we-Republican Party.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party straw poll with 46 percent of the vote. Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As expected, the straw poll winner does not necessarily win the state, but Romney won the state's delegates with 23, while Gingrich won 13.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
