src: """Ngethamsanqa akukho nto yenzekileyo kum, kodwa ndibone umbono owoyikisayo njengoko abantu bebezama ukophula iifestile ukuze baphume. Abantu babebethe intsimbi zefestile ngezitulo, kodwa iglasi yefestile zazingophuleki. Ekugqibeleni enye iglasi yefestile yophuka, kwaye baqala ukuphuma ngefestile,"" utshilo osindileyo uFranciszek Kowal."
mt: """There is nothing to report, but I believe that people are trying to get out of the building. People are taking the stairs, but the stairs are also blocked. One of the stairs is on fire, and people are trying to get out through the stairs,"" said Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Isichotho iTropical Danielle, esesine ukuthiywa ngo 2010 e-Atlantic kwisizini yezichotho, siziqulunqile kwi-eastern Atlantic Ocean. Isaqhwithi, esiku malunga neekhilomitha ezingama-3000 ukusuka eMiami, eFlorida, sineyona mimoya ebhudla kangange -40 mph (i-64 kph). Iinzulu lwazi kwi National Hurricane Centre ziqikelela ukuba iDanielle iza komelela kwinkanyamba ngoLwesithathu. Njengoko isaqhwithi singekaziwa siza kufika nini, kunzima ukubona ukuba i-United States okanye i-Caribbean zingachaphazeleka njani.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season tropical storm Danielle, which is expected to strengthen in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm is about 300 miles (480 km) east of Miami, Florida, with winds of up to 40 mph (64 kph). The National Hurricane Center is predicting Danielle will strengthen into a hurricane on Wednesday. As the storm is still far away, it is too early to tell what impact it will have on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: I Gqirha Lee usose wachaza inkxalazo zakhe ngengxelo yokuba abantwana e Turkey bathe ngoku bosuleleleka sisifo iA(H5N1) yintsholongwane ye avina influenza bengakhange bagule. Olunye uphando lucebisa ukuba isifo kufuneka sehle kubungozibaso ngaphambi kokuba sibangele ubhubhani kwihlabathi lonke, watsho. Kukho ixhala lokuba izigulana zingasulelaa abantu abangakumbi ngokuqhubeka nobomi babo ukuba iziphumo zomkhuhlane azikho ngamandla.
mt: 1. The Gqirha Lee said that children in Turkey are at risk of contracting the A(H5N1) strain of avian influenza. Another report says that the virus could spread to the entire population before it is contained, and that it is not a serious threat. There is also a report that children are at risk of contracting the virus if they are exposed to birds.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Ukususela kubusuku bango-9 Agasti umbindi wesaqhwithi esinbizwa Morakot ubumalunga neekhilomitha ezingamashumi asixhenxe ukususela kwiphondo laseTshayina eliyiFujian. I typhoon iqikelelwa ukuba ibheka ngase China nge eleven kph.
mt: 9 August, a typhoon named Morakot hit Taiwan's Fujian province with winds of up to 11 kph.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush uye wafika eSingapore ngentsasa yangoNovember 16, eqalisa utyelelo lwakhe lweveki lwase-Asia. Wabuliswa ngowase Singapore's uSekela Nkulumbuso u Wong Kan Seng baxoxa imeko zoshishino nogrogriso kunye Nkulumbuso yase Singapore u Lee Hsien Loong. Emva kweveki yelahleko kunyulo lwaphakathi enyakeni, uBush uxelele abaphulaphuli ngokwandiswa korhwebo e-Asia.
mt: 16 November 2005, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for his first visit to Asia. He was welcomed by Singapore's Prime Minister Goh Chok Tong and Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Defence, Mr. Lee Hsien Loong. After the official welcoming ceremony, Bush met with Asian leaders and discussed regional security issues.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Isaziso sanamhlanje sikwandisile ukuzibophelela kukarhulumente ngoMatshi walo nyaka ukuxhasa ngemali iinqwelo ezongezelelweyo. Ama-300 ongezelelweyo azisa iinqwelo ezi-1,300 zizonke eziza kufunyanwa ukunciphisa ukuxinana.
mt: 300 people were killed in the attacks, which were the first of 1,300 attacks that were planned to be carried out.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Uthe, ""Akukho zinkcukatha ezithi kunohlaselo olulindelweyo. Kodwa ke, ukwehliswa sezinga lengozi ukuya kwelixhalabisayo akuthethi ukuba ingozi iphelile."""
mt: "Well, there's no such thing as a free lunch. But, if you're going to a restaurant, you should ask if the food is free."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: UMartelly ufunge iBhunga elitsha leThutyana loNyulo (i-CEP) lamalungu alithoba izolo. Ngunyaka ka Martelly's wesihlandlo sesihlanu se-CEP kwiminyaka emine. Kule nyanga iphelileyo ikomishoni kamongameli icebise ngaphambi kokwehla kwe-CEP iqela lamanyathelo okusondeza izwe ekuvoteni. Umbutho wayeyimpendulo ka-Martelly kwitoyitoyi zotshintsho ezazisanda ezaqala ngeyeDwarha. Olunye uqhankqalazo obeluye lubendlongondlongo belubangelwa kukungabanjwa kovoto, olunye ebekumelwe kubanjwe ngonyaka ka-2011.
mt: Martelly's government dissolved the Council of the ElectricitÃ© d'Haiti (CEP) on Saturday. Martelly's first CEP secretary resigned last year before the CEP was dissolved. The CEP was created by Martelly's government in 2011. The other CEP secretary was fired in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: I-USA Gymnastics iyayixhasa ileta evela kwiKomiti yeOlimpiki eUnited States, yaye iyayamkela imfuneko yokuba intsapho yezeOlimpiki kufuneka ikhuthaze iimeko zokhuseleko kubo bonke abadlali bethu. Siyavumelana nengxelo ye-USOC yokuba umdla weembaleki zethu kunye neeklabhu, kunye nemidlalo yabo, inokuncediswa ngcono ngokuqhubela phambili notshintsho olunentsingiselo kumbutho wethu, endaweni yokumiselwa ngokusesikweni. I-USA Gymnastics iyaluxhasa uphando oluzimeleyo oluza kubhenca ukuba ukuxhatshazwa okukhulu ngohlobo oluchazwe ngamaxhoba kaLarry Nassar kuye kwaqhubeka njani kangangexesha elide yaye iza kwamkela naluphi utshintsho olufanelekileyo. I-USA Gymnastics kunye ne-USOC banenjongo efanayo-yokwenza umdlalo wejiminastiki, nabanye, bakhuseleke kangangoko kunokwenzeka ukuba iimbaleki zilandele amaphupha azo kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, efanelekileyo nexhotyisiweyo.
mt: USA Gymnastics has been suspended from the International Olympic Committee, and the USOC has been suspended from the IOC. We are in full agreement with the USOC that our athletes deserve better than what we have provided them. We are committed to doing everything in our power to ensure that our athletes are safe and supported. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have been working diligently to make sure that our athletes are safe and supported. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have been working diligently to make sure that our athletes are safe and supported.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal â making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "I-US Navy nayo ithe iyasiphanda esi siganeko. Bongezile kwingxelo, ""Iqela labaqeshwa lisebenzela ukubona eyona ndlela yokulanda inqwelo mafutha"". Inqanawa yokuphindezela imigodi ye-Avengers, inqanawa yayisendleleni eya ePuerto Princesa ePalawan. Ibhaliselwe kumKhosi wesiXhenxe we-US Navy futhi ise-Sasebo, e-Nagasaki e-Japan."
mt: "The US Navy is also involved. It's a matter of finding the right way to deal with the situation." The aircraft carrier USS Carl Vinson, the flagship of the Avengers, was in the vicinity of Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It was reported by the US Navy's Commander, Fleet Activities Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navyâs Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Ngengokuhlwa yangeCawa, umongameli we-United States uDonald Trump, kwingxelo ekhutshwe ngunobhala wezamaphepha, uchaze ukuba amajoni e-US aza kumka e-Syria Ingxelo ikhutshwe emva koba u-Trump ethethe emnxebeni noMongameli wase-Turkey u-Recep Tayyip Erdogan. ITurkey iya kuthathela kuyo ukujonga amajonii e-ISIS abanjiweyo ngokutsho kwengxelo, amazwe aseYurophu awavuma ukuwabuyisa.
mt: In a tweet, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a reported conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, said the U.S. would be leaving Syria "very soon." Turkey is expected to take over the fight against ISIS, according to the reported conversation, with European countries expected to help.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: I-Coalition nemikhosi yaseAfghan yaya kwindawo eza kuhlala kuyo nezinye inqwelomoya ze-coalition zithunyelwe ukuya kuncedisa. Ingozi yehle phezulu kumantla entaba, kaye kukholeleka ukuba nkungenxa yomlilo obumkhulu. Iinzame zokukhangela indawo yengozi zihlangatyezwa yimozulu embi kunye neendawo ezimbi.
mt: 1. The Coalition and Afghan forces have been deployed to the area to assist with the rescue. The fire is burning in the mountains, and it is difficult to determine the extent of the fire. 2. The area is inaccessible by road, and the fire is burning in the mountains.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Emva kokuba idama lakhiwe ngo-1963, izikhukula zamaxesha athile ezaziza kusasaza intlenga kuwo wonke umlambo zamiswa. Ezi ngqimba bezifuneka ukuze kwenziwe iingqimba zesanti namalwandle aza kuba yindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle. Ngenxa yoko, iintlobo ezimbini zeentlanzi ziye zaphela kumhlaba wonke, kwaye ezinye ezimbini zibe sengozini, kubandakanya ne-humpback chub. Nangona izinga lamanzi liyakunyuka ukuya kutsho kancinane ezinyaweni emva kwezikhukhula, amagosa anethemba ayakonela ukubuyisela imigqaliselo yesanti ekhukhulisekileyo ngumsinga.
mt: 1963 was a banner year for the world's oceans. Two new species of whales were discovered, one in the Atlantic and one in the Pacific. The Atlantic species was named the northern bottlenose whale, and the Pacific species was named the humpback whale. But the oceans have changed since then, and the humpback whale is now in danger of extinction.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

The Atlantic species was named the northern bottlenose whale, and the Pacific species was named the humpback whale. But the oceans have changed since then, and the humpback whale is now in danger of extinction.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Umzi wozakuzo wase-United States ozinze eNairobi, eKenya ukhuphe isilumkiso sokuba âabavukeli baseSomaliaâ baceba ukuhlasela eKenya nase-Ethopia ngeziqhushumbisi zokuzibulala. I-U.S ithe ifumene ulwazi kwisthunywa esingavelanga oluchaza ngobuvetshe intsebenziso abaqhushumbhisi abazibulalayo bazoqhushumbhisa ""iindawo ezibalulekileyo"" e-Thiopiya nase-Kenya."
mt: "The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has warned of a "Somali terrorist" threat to Kenya and Ethiopia with a possible attack. The U.S. warned of a possible attack on "high-profile" targets in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Amagqwetha aseGrisi adumileyo uSakis Kechagioglou kunye noGeorge Nikolakopoulos bavalelwe kwijele iKorydallus eAthens emva kokuba efunyenwe enetyala lobuqhetseba norhwaphilizo. Ngenxa yoku, ihlazo elikhulu kwisizwe somthetho wesi Greek liveziwe ngokuhlaziswa kwezenzo ezingekho semthethweni see jaji, amagqwetha, onothimba abatshutshisi abazenzileyo kwiminyaka edlulileyo. Kwiiveki ezimbalwana ezigqithileyo, emvakoba ulwazi olukhutshwe ngumbhali u-Makis Triantafylopoulos embonisweni wakhe odumileyo Kumabona kude ""iZoungla"" ku-Alpha TV, ummeli wo-Palamente negqwetha, uPetros Mantaouvalos watyholwa njengoba abasenzi be-ofisi yakhe babenesandla ezintsebenzweni ezingekhosemthethweni nobukrelemnqa. Ngapha koko, ijaji ephezulu u-Evangelos Kalousis uvalelwe njengoko wafunyanwa enetyala lorhwaphilizo kunye nokuziphatha ngoku phalala."
mt: "Greek authorities identified the two dead as Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos. Because of this, the Greek justice system is under scrutiny for the lack of a functioning legal system, the judges, the prosecutors and the witnesses. In the case of the two dead, the prosecutor, Petros Mantaouvalos, was accused of having a conflict of interest and was removed from the case. In addition, the judge, Evangelos Kalousis, was accused of having a conflict of interest and was removed from the case."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: URobin Uthappa ngoyena ube namanqaku maninzi kwii-iining, imitsi eyi-70 kwiibhola eziyi-41 ebetha amanqaku amane ayi-11, namathandathu ayi-2. Ababethi abaphakathi abakwi oda, uSachin Tendulkar kunye noRahul Dravid, baqhube kakuhle kwaye benza ubudlelwane obulikhulu. Kodwa,emveni kokulahlekelwa nguthinti ka Kaptein I India ifumene izigaba iziyi 36 yaphulukana noothinti abayi 7 ukuphelisa umdlalo.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa is the oldest player in the team, with 11 fours and 2 sixes. The other players, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, also performed well and put up a big score. However, the Indian captain lost his wicket on 36, and the team was reduced to 7 for 7.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Umlawulu wee-Commons u-Adam Cuerden uchaze ifratsi yakhe yokususwa kolwazi xa ebethetha ne-Wikinews kule nyanga idlulileyo. ""U [Wales] wasixokisela zisabekwa. Kuqala, ngokwenza ngathi wenzela izizathu zomthetho. Okwesibini, ngokwenza ngathi ebesimamele, ukuyoqhina ekucimeni kwakhe imizobo."" Ukucaphuka kwabahlali kukhokelele kwimizamo yangoku yokuyila umgaqo-nkqubo ngokubhekisele kumxholo wesini kule ndawo igcina izigidi zosasazo ezinelayisensi elubala."
mt: "The Commons' Adam Cuerden has been busy editing Wikinews articles this year.  ""He was very helpful.  First, he was editing the legal articles.  Second, he was editing, and he was very helpful in the comments section.""  His contributions were very helpful in keeping the site up to date with the latest news."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: UPeter Lenz, umdlali wemidyarho yezithuthu oneminyaka eyi-13, uye wasweleka emva kokutshayisa e-Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Ngelixa ekwidolo lasekuzifudumezeni, uLenz wawa kwibhayisikile yakhe, waza wagilwa ngkhuphisana naye uXavier Zayat. Waye wahoywa ngabezonyango abasebaleni waza wasiwa esibhedlele sasekuhlaleni apho waye waswelekela kamva. UZayat khange onzakale kulo ngozi.
mt: 13-year-old Peter Lenz was killed after being struck by a car at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. As the race was being red-flagged, Lenz was struck by a car driven by Xavier Zayat. He was airlifted to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was uninjured.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Kule mihla, uhambo ngenqwelo moya alufane lubhukishwe ngokuthe ngqo ngaphandle kokuqala kuthelekiswe amaxabiso. Ngamanye amaxesha inqwelomoya efanayo inokuba namaxabiso ahluke kakhulu kubahlanganisi abahlukeneyo kwaye kuyabhatala ukuthelekisa iziphumo kunye nokujonga kwiwebhusayithi yenqwelomoya ngokwayo ngaphambi kokubhukisha.
mt: 2010, the first crash-free year in aviation history. In previous years, the number of accidents was high and the number of fatalities was even higher. The number of accidents has been steadily decreasing over the last few years, but the number of fatalities has been increasing. This is because the number of accidents has been decreasing, but the number of fatalities has been increasing.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Amashishini okuthumela abhatalwa kakuhle ngoku fikisa imithwalo yabantu ngokukhawulezisileyo. Ngokwesiqhelo, ixesha libalulekile neempepha zeshishini, amabhaso namalungu are phindeneyo ukwenzela ukulungiswa kwezinto. Kwezinye iindlela, iinkampani ezinkulu ziba neenqwelo ntaka zazo, kodwa kwezinye iindlela nakwiinkampani ezincinane kubekho ingxaki. Ukuba bathumela izinto ngohambo lwasemoyeni, kwezinye iindlela zinokuthatha iintsuku ukuba zidlule kwindawo yokwathula impahla nendawo yokuhlola abantu nezinto ezingenayo kwizikhululo zeenqwelo-moya. Eyona ndlela yokuyihambisa ngokukhawuleza ibe kukuyithumela njengempahla efakwa kwinqwelo ntaka. Imithetho yohambo ngenqwelo ntaka ayizukubavumela ukuba bathumele impahla engahambi nomniniyo, kulapho ungena khona.
mt: The news media reported that the fire trucks were able to quickly extinguish the flames.  The fire was reported in the early morning, and the news media, photos and video were able to quickly spread the word.  In some cases, large companies were able to quickly respond to the fire, but in other cases, smaller companies were not.  If the fire was reported in the early morning, in some cases it took a day to get the fire trucks and the fire department to the scene.  One way to quickly spread the word was to report the fire as a fire truck.  The fire department was able to quickly respond to the fire, and the fire was quickly extinguished.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

mt: 1. You must have a valid pilot's license. However, even if you are a licensed pilot, you must be aware that the privileges of a pilot are limited and that the operation of an aircraft in flight is subject to certain limitations.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Kufuneka ukhethe inqwelo moya ekwindibaniselwano Ohamba Ngayo rhoqo ngobunono. ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: I-Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) yeyaziwayo yango 17th-century district erhangqwe i-Binnenstad yase-Amsterdam. Wonke lo mmandla ubizwa ngokuba yi-UNESCO World Heritage Site ngenxa yokukhetheka kwenkcubeko kunye nembali yayo, kwaye amaxabiso epropathi aphakathi kwawona aphezulu elizweni.
mt: 17th-century Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a 17th-century district of the inner city of Amsterdam. All of the canals in the district are designated as UNESCO World Heritage Site because of their historical value and beauty, and the area is home to many famous museums.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: I-Phnom Krom, ikwi-12 km kumzantsi-ntshona we Siem Reap. Le tempile ephezu kwenduli yakhiwa ekupheleni kwenkulungwane yesithoba ngelixa lokulawula kuka Kumkani u-Yasovarman. Ukukhanyi kangako kwetempile nokubukeka xa ujonge ngapha kwechibi iTonle Sap kwenza ukungazisoli ngonyuka le nduli. Utyelelo kwindawo lungadityaniswa ngokuchuliweyo kunye nohambo ngesikhephe oluya echibini. Kufuneka i-Angkor Pass ukuze ungene kwitempile, ngoko ke ungalibali ukuza nepasipothi yakho xa usiya kwi-Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km south of Siem Reap, Phnom Krom, a temple on the bank of the Tonle Sap lake, where the ashes of King Yasovarman were scattered. The temple is visible from the lake, and can be reached by boat. The temple is a small, but beautiful structure, with a large central tower, and a small moat. The Angkor Pass is required to enter the temple, but is free for children under 12.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: i-Antarctica yeyona ndawo ibandayo Ehlabathini, futhi ingqonge i-Pole yasemazntsi. Ukutyelelwa kubakhenkethi kuyabiza, kufuna amandla omzimba, anokwenzeka kuphela ehlotyeni ngo-Novemba, kwaye ikakhulu kunikelwe umda kwiPeninsula, Islands kunye neRoss Sea. Amawaka amajoni ahlala apha ngehlobo kwiindawo eziphantse zibe ngamashumi amane anesibhozo. Umphakathi we-Antarctica yindawo ephakamileyo egqunywe ngumkhence ofikelela kwiikhilomitha eziyi-2 ukuya kweziyi-3. Ngamanye amaxesha kubakho ukhenketho olukhethekileyo olwenziwa ngenqwelo moya, ukuze kuziswe abanyuki ntaba okanye kufikwe kwi-Pole, yona enendawo enkulu yokufikela.
mt: 1. Antarctica is the coldest, driest and windiest continent on Earth. It is also the highest, with an average elevation of 2,000 to 4,000 metres. 2. The Antarctic Treaty, signed in 1959, sets aside the entire continent as a scientific preserve. 3. The Antarctic Peninsula is the most northerly part of the continent, and the only part that is not covered by ice. 4. The South Pole is located in the eastern hemisphere, and the North Pole in the western hemisphere. 5. The continent is divided into two regions: the Antarctic Peninsula and the Ross Sea. 6. ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Indawo zemiboniso yakudala azisasetyenziswa unamhlanje, sezihleli njengemyuziyam, okanye iindawo zokufundisa. Njengoko ukungcoliseka okungephi kokukhanya ngezo ntsuku kwakungeyongxaki efana nale yale mihla, kudla ngokubakho ezixekweni, okanye kwiziza ekulula ukuya kuzo kunezo zakhiwe kumaxesha angoku. Izixhobo zophanda ezinintsi zalemihla ziluluhlu kwindawo ezisemva kwiimeko ezilungele oko.
mt: 3D printing has been used for years, as in the production of prototypes, or in education. As with other technologies, it has been used to make things that are already available, or to make things that are not. 3D printed objects are often made of plastic, but can also be made of metal.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Luninzi unxweme oluneendawo zokudada ngenxa yokuba i-Auckland iphakathi kwamazibuko amabini. Ezona ndawo zithandwayo zikwimimandla emithathu. iindawo ezise-North Shore (kwingingqi ye-North Harbour) zikuLwandlekazi lwePasifiki yaye zisukela e-Long Bay emntla ziye e-Devonport emzantsi. Phantse zonke ziilwandle ezinesanti kwaye ezikhuselekileyo ekubhukudeni. Zikwanayo nemithunzi ebangelwa yimiti I pohutukwana. Unxweme lweTamaki Drive lukwiZibuko lase-Waitermata, kwindawo yeengcungcu zase-Mission Bay nase-St Helliers, unye ne-St Heliers eCentral Auckland. Ngamanye amaxesha ngamalwandle adla ngokuzaliswa zintsapho yaye aneevenkile ezahlukahlukeneyo ezingasenxwemeni. Ukudada kukhuselekile.
mt: 11 people have been killed in the Auckland area due to the earthquake. The North Shore (North Harbour) area is affected by the earthquake. The North Shore area is on the Pacific Ocean and is also affected by the tsunami. All the buildings are damaged. There are also damaged roads and bridges. The Tamaki Drive area is affected by the earthquake. The Mission Bay and St Helliers areas in Central Auckland are also affected. The tsunami has been reported in the area and has caused some damage. The earthquake has caused some damage.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Nceda ukhumbule ukuba eneneni utyelela ingcwaba ekungcwatywe kulo abantu abaninzi, kwakunye nokuba yindawo ebaluleke ngendlela engathethekiyo kubantu abaninzi emhlabeni wonke. Asemaninzi amadoda namabhinqa aphilayo akwazi ukusinda ngexesha aye lapha, nabanye abaninzi abanezihlobo zabo ziye zabulawa okanye zasetyenziswa de zafa apho, amaYuda nabangengomaYuda kuyafana. Nceda uyiphathe lesayithi ngembeko nentlonipho eyidingayo. Sukuhlekisa ngokubulawa kwabantu ngamaNazi okanye ngeHolocaust. Ungayonakalisi le ndawo ngokubhala okanye ngokukrola nge-graffiti kwizakhiwo.

ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseBarcelona sisiCatalan neSpanish. Malunga nesiqingatha sikhetha ukuthetha isiCatalan, uninzi lwabantu luyasazi, kwaye phantse wonke umntu wazi iSpanish. Kodwa ke, amaphawu evezwe ngesi-Catalan ngoba sisekwe njengolwimi lelizwe ngokomthetho. Sekunjalo, iSpanish sisetyenziswa kakhulu kwizithuthi zikawonke-wonke nakwezinye iindawo. Izaziso ezithe rhoqo kwi-Metro zenziwa ngesi -Catalan kuphela, kodwa iziphazamiso ezingalindelwanga zichazwa yinkqubo ezilawulayo ngenqwaba yamalwimi njenge-Spanish, isiNgesi, isi-French, isi-Arab nesi-Japan.
mt: The languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Most of the population speaks Catalan, but everyone understands Spanish. However, the official language of the region is Catalan, so Spanish is used in most official documents. The Metro is named in Catalan only, but the signs are in Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Kumazwe aphuhlileyo kulemihla, ukunikeza ngenkozo ze bed and breakfast inyungeke yaba kwizinga lobugcisa. Kwicala eliphezulu, kucacile ukuba izinto ezimbini eziphambili iiB&B ezikhuphisana ngazo: yindawo yokulala nesidlo sakusasa. Ngokunjalo ke, kwezona ndawo zintle , umntu uyakwazi ukuba afumane eyona nto yokulala isemagqabini, mhlawumbi ingubo eyenziwe ngesandla okanye ibhedi yakudala. Isidlo sasekuseni siseno banezinto zehlobo zalongingqi okanye isidlo esithandwa ngumni. Ukuseta kunokuba sisakhiwo esidala esinembali ngempahla ye-antique, indawo enezinto zokucoca umzimba kunye nedama lokubhukuda.

src: Isixeko saseBeijing e-China siza kuba sisixeko esiza kubamba iMidlalo yeOlimpiki yasebusika ngo-2022, nesiza kuyenza isixeko sokuqala ukubamba ii-Olimpiki zasehlotyeni nezasebusika. I-Beijing iza kubamba umnyhadala wokuvula nowokuvala kunye neziganeko zemidlalo yomkhence owenziwe ngaphakathi. Eminye iminyhadala yeskiing iya kuba kwingingqi yase Taizicheng ski eZhangjiakou, malunga ne 220 km (140 miles) ukusuka e Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China, has been selected as the first city to host both the Winter and Summer Olympics, in 2022. Beijing will host the Winter Olympics for the first time and the Summer Olympics for the second time. The Winter Olympics will be held in the new Beijing Olympic Village and the Summer Olympics will be held in the existing Olympic Village. Other venues will be located in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Iflu yentaka, okanye eyakusakuba yi avian ifluenza, ingosulela intake kuquka nabantu. Zingaphantsi kwewaka iimeko ezixeliweyo ebantwini, kodwa ezinye zazo ziye zabulala. Abantu abaninzi bebesebenza ngeenkukhu, kodwa ukho umngcipheko kwabanye abathanda ukubuka iintaka.
mt: 1. The flu virus, or avian influenza, can be transmitted to humans. Some strains of the virus are deadly to humans, but others are not. Most people who contract the flu are healthy, but some are at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: IiVikings zasebenzisa imilambo yaseRashiya ukuze zibuyele kuLwandle Olumnyama nakuLwandle lwe-Caspian. Iinxalanye zezi ndlela zingasetyenziswa. Jonga ukuba kuyimfuneko ukuba neepemithi, zona ekusenokuba nzima ukuzifumana. I White SeaâBaltic Canal idibanisa i-Arctic Ocean ukuya kwi Baltic Sea, nge-Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, ikakhulu ngemilambo namachweba. I Lake Onega iqhakamishelalana ne Volga, ngoko ke xa usuka kulwandle I Caspiam uhamba nge Russia kusenokwazeka.
mt: The Vikings used the Dnieper River to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. The canals were not used. As the ice melted, the water was not frozen. The White SeaâBaltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, the largest city in Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White SeaâBaltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: "ISingapore, yindawo ekhuselekileyo ngokuqhelekileyo yaye kulula ukuhamba kuyo, kwaye unako nokuthenga phantse nantoni na emva kokufika kwakho. Kodwa ukubekwa (""kwindawo ezitshisayo"" kumaqondo nje amancinci kumntla we-equator kuya kufuneka uqhelane kunye nobushushu (rhoqo) nengqatsini yelanga (xa isibhakabhaka sicwengile, nto ley enqabileyo)."
mt: ""In Singapore, you can get around easily, and you can buy things at any time after you arrive. But if you are going to the equator, you should be prepared for the heat and humidity (high humidity) and the sun (if you are not used to it, it can be very hot).""
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Izinto ezibhakiweyo zaseJamani zimnandi, kwaye eBavaria, zinkulu kwaye ngokufanayo nezo zommelwane wayo osemazantsi, i-Ostriya. Ixhaphikile intlama yeziqhamo, ama-apile ayaphekwa abe yintlama unyaka wonke, wona amaqunube neeplam zenziwa ngehlobo. Ezinye izinto ezibhakwe eJamani zidla ngokuba nee-almonds, ii-hazelnuts kunye namanye amantongomane. Iikeyiki ezithandwayo zidla ngokuhamba kakuhle nekofu esisitshoqolo. Ukuba ufuna encinci kodwa enesondlo ipheysri, zama ngokukwengingqi ibizwa ngokuba yiBerliner, yiPfannkuchen okanye yiKrapfen.

ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Ukuba ufuna ukuhamba hamba amazwe ngaphandle kokudleka kakhulu, ukuba kuyimfuneko, indlela yokuphila okanye njengocelo mngeni, zikhona iindlela zokwenza oko. Ngokusisiseko, ziwela kwiindidi ezimbini: Usebenza ngoxa ukuhambo okanye unciphise iindleko zakho. Eli nqaku lithetha ngale yokugqibela. Abobazimiseleyo ukunikezela ubuntofontofo, ixesha nokulindeleka ukwenzela ukwehlisa amaxabiso ukusondela kunothi, jonga elona xabiso lincinci esinalo. Ingcebiso ithatha ukuba abahambi ababi, bengangeni ngaphandle kwemvume, abathathi nxaxheba kwimakethi engekho mthethweni, abaceli, okanye baxhaphaze abanye abantu ukuze bafumane inzuzo.

ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. src: "Ukungena emotweni yakho uthabathe uhambo olude lungumceli mngeni olula. Ngokungafaniyo zezithuthi ezikhulu, kumele ukuba sele uqhelile ukuqhuba imoto yakho kwaye uyakwazi nokohluleka kwayo. Ukumisa intente kwindawo yomntu okanye edolophini, nokuba ingakanani, kunokutsala umdla ongafunekiyo. Ngelifutshane, ukusebenzisa imoto yakho ngeyona ndlela ibhethele yokuhamba kodwa kunqabile ukuba isetyenziselwe ""ukukhempisha"". Ukukhempisha ngemoto kunokwenzeka ukuba unayo i-minivan enkulu, i-SUV, iSedan okanye iStation Wagon esinezitulo ezihlayo."
mt: "Entering your driveway is a smooth ride. Like most major roads, you should be able to drive your car without any problems. Passing a car or a pedestrian, or even a cyclist, is not a big deal. However, driving in a car with a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon with a large blind spot."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Isixeko sanamhlanje seCasablanca sasekwa ngabalobi beBerber ngenkulungwane ye-10 BCE, kwaye sasetyenziswa ngamaFenike, amaRoma, kunye neMerenids njengezibuko elibizwa ngokuba yiAnfa. Ama-Portuguese ayichitha aphinda ayakha phantsi kwegama i-Casa Branca, kanti azokuphinde ayishiye emva kwenyikima ngo-1755. I sultani yase Morocco yaye yasakha kakutsha isixeko njenge Daru I-Badya yaze yanikwa igama I Casablanca ngabarwebi baseSpain abathi badala izigxina zorwebo apho. ICasablanca yenye yezona ndawo zinomdla wokuthenga eMorocco. KwiMedina yakudala kulula ukufumana iindawo ezithengisa iimpahla zesiko laseMorocco, ezinje ngeethegi, izinto zobumba, iimpahla zesikhumba, iihookahs, kunye negeegaws epheleleyo, kodwa konke kubakhenkethi.
mt: Casablanca was founded in the 10th century BCE by Berber tribes, and was later used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and Merenids as a port. The Portuguese took over the area and renamed it Casa Branca, but were forced to leave after the earthquake of 1755. The Sultan of Morocco renamed the city Daru I-Badya, and the Spanish renamed it Casablanca. Casablanca is the largest city in Morocco. The Medina, the old city, is a maze of narrow streets, and is the place to buy traditional Moroccan goods, such as carpets, leather, and hookahs, but also has modern shopping malls.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Ngo-1994, eyayingeyase-Armenia i-Nagorno-Karabakh inginqgi ye-Azerbaijan yaqala imfazwe nama-Azeris. Ngokuxhaswa yiArmenia, iriphablikhi entsha yayilwa. Sekunjalo, akukho lizwe - kuquka neArmenia - elilijonga njengelisemthethweni. Ingxoxo ezikrelekrele kulommandla ziyaqhubeka ukwenza bhetele ubudlelwane phakathi kwe Armenia ne Azerbaijan.
mt: 1994, the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan was captured by Armenian forces. According to Armenia, the new republic was created. There is no country - except Armenia - that is recognized as a state. The conflict continues to be a major issue between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Enye yezinto ezigqamileyo nge-Charlotte, e-North Carolina, kungenxa yokuba iintsapho zinokukhetha okuninzi apho. Abahlali abasuka kwezinye iindawo bathanda ukuchaza ububele bamakhaya njengesona sizathu sokuya apho, kwaye nabakhenkethi bafumana isixeko silula nokusonwabela apho kukho nabantwana. Kule minyaka iyi-20 idlulileyo, izinto ezifanele abantwana onokukhetha kuzo eMntla weCharlotte ziye zanda kakhulu. Iintsapho zaseCharlotte azidli ngokusebenzisa iiteksi, nangona ziye zizisebenzise phantsi kweemeko ezithile. Kukho intlawuliso yokukhwelisa abakhweli abadlule ku-2, ke olu khetho lunokuba duru kakhulu kunokuba luyimfuneko.
mt: 20 years ago, Charlotte, North Carolina, was the site of a deadly shooting. Residents from other areas came to the scene to mourn the loss of children, and police found the city in chaos. In the last 20 years, the city has made great strides. The shootings in Charlotte are now done with guns, and the city has made great strides in reducing the number of shootings.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Phambi kokufika kwabo base Spain ngesenturi ye 16th, iChile ekumantla yayiphansti kolawulo kwe Inca ngelixa ama Araucaniani ( Mapuche) ayehlala kumbindi nakumzantsi we Chile. Abantu abayiMapuche, liqela lokugqibela labantu bomthonyama baseMelika abangazange bangene ngokupheleleyo phantsi kolawulo lweSpeyini de iChile yazimela geqe. Nangona I-Chile yaba nenkululeko ngo 1810 (ngelixa leemfazwe zika Napoleonic ezashiya i-Spain singenaye urhulumente otsala imikhala iminyaka emide), uloyiso oluqinisekisiweyo kumaSpanish zange lufumaneke kwade kwaba ngumnyaka ka 1818.
mt: 16th century Spanish conquistadors arrived in Chile and forced the Inca to submit. The Mapuche, a Native American people, refused to submit to Spanish rule. However, Chile declared independence from Spain in 1810 (after the Napoleonic Wars ended Spanish rule), and the Spanish did not regain control until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: ICinque Terre, okuthetha imihlaba emihlanu, iquka iilali ezintlanu ezingaselunxwemeni zaseRiomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza naseMonterosso ezikummandla wase-Italiya iLiguria. Zibhaliwe ku-Ludwe le-Lifa Lemveli lwe-UNESCO. Ukutyhubela iinkulungwane, abantu bakha ngononophelo ukwakha amathambeka kwindawo emxinwa, enamatye de aya kuthi xhaxhe ngakwelwandle. Enye enconywayo kukungaveli kophuhliso lwezamashishini ayo. Iindlela, oololiweo, nezikhephe zihlanganisa iilali, futhi iimoto azikwazi ukufikelela zivela ngaphandle.
mt: 5 Terre, the five villages, Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, are located in the Liguria region of Italy. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The area is popular with tourists, who are often seen walking along the narrow streets, and swimming in the sea. One of the main attractions is the brightly coloured houses. The roads, paths and steps are all made of stone.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Esona sizathu seengozi ebusika ziindlela ezityibilikisayo, iindlela zokuhamba (indlela zabantu) futhi ingakumbi iziteps. Ubuncinane, udinga izihlangu ezinesoli efanelekileyo. Izihlangu zasehlotyeni zidla ngokutyibilika kumkhenkce nakwikhephu, yaye nezinye iibhutsi zobusika zikhe zingafaneleki. Ipateni kufuneka ibe nzulu ngokwaneleyo, i-5 mm (1/5 intshi) okanye nangaphezulu, kwaye izinto zithambe ngokwaneleyo kumaqondo obushushu abandayo. Ezinye iibhutsi zinee-studs kwaye kukho izixhobo ezongeziweyo ezongeziweyo zeemeko ezimtyibilizi, ezilungele izihlangu ezininzi kunye neebhutsi, zenzelwe izithende okanye izithende kunye nangaphantsi. IIchops funeke zibephantsi zibesixwexwe. Isanti, igrabile okanye ityiwa (isodiyam khlorhayidi) ifane isakazwe ezindleleni okanye kwindlela zokuphucula umtsalane.

ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Iziqithi zase-Cook lilizwe leziqithi elimanyane ngokukhululekileyo ne-New Zealan, ese-Polynesia, esiphakathini ku-Mzantsi Wolwandle le-Pacific. Iyi archipelago ene-15 yeziqithi ezisasazeke kumgama oyi-2.2 million km2 yolwandle. Iziqithi zinexesha lommandla elinye neHawaii, ngoko ngamanye amaxesha kuthiwa zi-âHawaii down underâ. Nangona incinci, ikhumbuza iindwendwe esele zindala zaseHawaii phambi kwabemi ngaphandle kwazo zonke iihotele ezinkulu zabakhenkethi kunye nolunye uphuhliso. Iziqithi zase-Cook azina zixeko kodwa zibunjwa ngeziqithi eziyi-15 ezohlukileyo. Eziyintlokoonayi-Rarotonga kunye ne-Aitutaki.
mt: 15 islands in the Cook Islands, a self-governing territory in free association with New Zealand, in the South Pacific. The archipelago consists of 15 islands covering a land area of 2.2 million km2 of ocean. The islands are often referred to as âHawaii down underâ. However, the climate, flora and fauna are distinctly different from Hawaii, and the islands lack the large resorts and other tourist infrastructure. The Cook Islands have 15 inhabited islands, but only two are of any size: Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Iziqithi zase-Cook lilizwe leziqithi elimanyane ngokukhululekileyo ne-New Zealan, ese-Polynesia, esiphakathini ku-Mzantsi Wolwandle le-Pacific. Iyi archipelago ene-15 yeziqithi ezisasazeke kumgama oyi-2.2 million km2 yolwandle. Iziqithi zinexesha lommandla elinye neHawaii, ngoko ngamanye amaxesha kuthiwa zi-âHawaii down underâ. Nangona incinci, ikhumbuza iindwendwe esele zindala zaseHawaii phambi kwabemi ngaphandle kwazo zonke iihotele ezinkulu zabakhenkethi kunye nolunye uphuhliso. Iziqithi zase-Cook azina zixeko kodwa zibunjwa ngeziqithi eziyi-15 ezohlukileyo. Eziyintlokoonayi-Rarotonga kunye ne-Aitutaki.
mt: 15 islands in the Cook Islands, a self-governing territory in free association with New Zealand, in the South Pacific. The archipelago consists of 15 islands covering a land area of 2.2 million km2 of ocean. The islands are often referred to as âHawaii down underâ. However, the climate, flora and fauna are distinctly different from Hawaii, and the islands lack the large resorts and other tourist infrastructure. The Cook Islands have 15 inhabited islands, but only two are of any size: Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Iipemiti kufuneka zigcinwe kwangaphambili. Kuya kufuneka ube nepemiti yokuhlala ubusuku eSirena. ISirena kuphela kwesikhululo seRanger esibonelela ngendawo yokuhlala kunye nokutya okushushu ukongeza kwinkampu. ILa Leona, iSan Pedrillo, kunye neLos Patos zibonelela ngeenkampu kuphela ngaphandle kwenkonzo yokutya. Unako ukufumana iipemithi zepakhi ngqo Kwisikhululo Soonogada sasePuerto JimÃ©nez, kodwa amakhadi ekhredithi awamkelwa. I The Park Service (MINAE) ayinikezi ngaphambi kwethuba imvume zepaki ezidlula kwinyanga enye phambi kokufika. I-CafeNet El Sol inikezela ngeenkonzo zokubhukisha ngexabiso leUS$30, okanye i$10 yosuku olunye; iinkcukacha zikwiphepha elingaphandle labo iCorcovado.
mt: 1. The park is open 24 hours a day. The Sirena Ranger Station is the only place to stay overnight. Sirena is the only place to camp and eat in the park. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos are the only places to camp without food. You can get the park permits at the Puerto JimÃ©nez office, but the park is closed. The Park Service (MINAE) is expected to open the park in one week. The CafeNet El Sol is charging US$30, or $10 per night; food is not included in the price of the campsite.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto JimÃ©nez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Ukukhempisha nge-ski: Le nto yenziwayo kuthiwa kukunyuka intaba nge-ski, ukuthorisha nge-ski okanye i-backcountry ski. Inxulumene kodwa ayidli ngakubandakanya I sitayela se alpine ski sokuthorisha okanye ukunambela iintaba, le yamva yenziwa kwintaba enyukayo yaye idinga iskis ezomeleleyo nebhutsi. Indlela yokwenza i-ski yibone ngendlela efanayo nendlela ekuhanjwa kuyo xa kunyukwa intaba. Xa iimeko zivuma, uza kukwazi ukuhamba imigama emide kunokba kunjalo xa uhamba ngenyawo â kodwa awuzufane uhambe ngesantya sokwenza i-ski usebenzisa iintonga ungaxwayanga ubhaka kwiindlela ezilungisiweyo.
mt: 1. Skiing: This is downhill skiing, backcountry skiing. Alpine skiing is downhill skiing on groomed slopes, with lifts. Backcountry skiing is skiing on ungroomed slopes, without lifts. The difference is in the equipment and the terrain. When you are on a groomed slope, you can control your speed by turning â but you canât control your speed on ungroomed slopes by turning. You have to use your skis to stop.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking â but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Ukothuswa kukubuyela kukhawuleza kubekho kunokothuswa yinkcubeko (kudla ngokubakho ixesha lokuyiqhela, kubakho ixesha elide, kwaye kuba mandundu kakhulu. Abahambi abadla ngokufumanisa kulula ukuqhelana nenkcubeko entsha ngamanye amaxesha baye babe nobunzima bokuphinda baqhelane nenkcubeko yabo. Xa uphindela ekhaya emva kokuhlala phesheya, sowuqhele izinto ezohlukileyo futhi sowulahle imikhwa yesiko lakowenu. Xa waya kwelinye ilizwe okokuqala, kusonkwenzeka ukuba abantu babe nomonde bekuqonda, besazi ukuba abantu abahambele kwilizwe elitsha badinga ukuliqhela. Amabantu basenokungayicingeli into yokuba ukunyamezela nokuqonda nako kuyafuneka kubahambi ababuyela emakhaya.
mt: 1. The most common cause of death is heart disease (heart attack, stroke, etc.), followed by cancer. 2. Most people die in their sleep or shortly after waking up. 3. When you go to a new country, it is important to be aware of the local customs and laws. 4. When you return home, it is important to take care of your belongings and to clean up after yourself. 5. When you travel, it is important to be aware of the local customs and laws.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Moose (ephinde yaziwe njenge elk) azimfuzo yocinezelo, kodwa ziyakuthi zizikhusele ukuba zikrokrela uloyikiso. Xa abantu bengayiboni inyamakazi inokuba yingozi, banokusondela kufutshane kakhulu kwaye bazibeka emngciphekweni.
mt: Moose (also known as elk) are known to be aggressive, but they can also be startled by loud noises. When people don't know the cow is pregnant, they often get very close and take pictures.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Xa kushushu kakhulu, abahambi bangabona imbonakalo engathi ngamanzi (okanye ezinye izinto). Ezi zingayingozi ukuba umhambi uleqa umbono, adlale ngamandla futhi namanzi aseleyo. Nezona ntlango zitshisayo zingabanda kakhulu ebusuku. I Hupothermia ngowona mngcipheko xa kungekho mpahla ishushu.
mt: 1. When it's very cold, you don't see water (or other things). This is a sign that you're losing heat and the water is freezing. The longer you stay out in the cold, the more you'll freeze. Hypothermia is a serious condition when you don't have a warm place to go.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: IDominican Republic (NgeSpanish: RepÃºblica Dominicana) lilizwe leCaribbean elikwihafu esempuma yesiqithi iHispaniola, esikwaseHaiti Ngaphandle kwelwandle ezisanti imhlophe nomhlaba ozintaba, ilizwe eli lilikhaya kwisixeko esidala samaMerika, ngoku eyinxalenye yeSanto Domingo. Esi siqithi saqala ukuhlalwa ngamaTaÃ­nos kunye namaCaribbean. AmaCaribbean yayingabantu abathetha isiArawakan ababefike malunga ne-10 000 BCE. Ngeminyakana embalwa nje ukulandela ukufika kwabakhangeli base-Europe, inani labantu baseTainos lalehlesiwe ngokubonakalayo ngabanqobi base-Spain. BeseFray BartolomÃ© de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) phakathi kuka-1492 no-1498, aboyisi abangamaSpanish babulala iiTaÃ­nos ezimalunga ne-100 000.
mt: 1. The Dominican Republic (Spanish: RepÃºblica Dominicana) is a Caribbean country located on the island of Hispaniola, sharing an island border with Haiti. The country is on the Caribbean Sea, Atlantic Ocean, and the Gulf of Mexico. It is the second largest nation in the Antilles after Cuba. The capital city is Santo Domingo. The island was originally inhabited by the TaÃ­nos and other Arawakan peoples. The first Europeans to arrive were the Spanish. The population of the TaÃ­nos was reduced from an estimated 250,000 to 500,000 in 1492 to about 500 by 1498, mainly through disease and exploitation. In 1492, Fray BartolomÃ© de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) wrote about the TaÃ­nos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: RepÃºblica Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the TaÃ­nos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray BartolomÃ© de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 TaÃ­nos.

Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Iziqithi zeMpuma Afrika zikulwandlekazi lwaseIndiya kunxweme olusempuma yeAfrika. I-Madagascar yeyona inkulu, kwaye ililizwekazi iyodwa xa kufikwa kwindalo yasendle. Unintsi lweziqithi ezincinci luba zizizwe ezizimeleyo, okanye ezinxulumene ne France, zaziwe ngeelwandle zolonwabo ezisemgangathweni. Ama-Arabhu nawo azisa i-Islam kumazwe, kwaye yathatha ngendlela enkulu eComoros naseMayotte. Ifuthe lase Europe nobukoloniyali baqala nge 15th senturi, xa uMphuthukezi u Vaco da Gama wafumana indlela yeKapa esuka e Europe isngisa e India.
mt: 1. The Indian Ocean is the third largest of the world's oceanic divisions, covering approximately 20% of the Earth's water surface. 2. The Indian Ocean is bounded by Africa, the Arabian Peninsula, the Indian subcontinent, Southeast Asia, and Australia. 3. The Indian Ocean is geologically younger than the other oceans, and is the smallest and shallowest of the four. 4. The Indian Ocean is the warmest ocean on Earth. 5. The Indian Ocean is the only ocean named after a continent.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: I-Ecuador ifuna ukuba abemi baseCuba bafumane isimemo ileta ngaphambi kokungena e-Ecuador ngokusebenzisa izikhululo zeenqwelomoya zamazwe aphesheya okanye kwiindawo zokungena kwimida. Le leta kufuneka ibhaliswe ngokusemthethweni nguMphathiswa Wezangaphandle wase-Ecuador, kwaye ahambelane neemfuno ezithile. Ezi mfaneleko zenzelwe ukuze zivumele ukuhamba phakathi kwala mazwe mabini. Abemi baseCuba abaneempepha zobumi base-US bamele batyelele kumzi wozakuzo wase-Ecuador ukuze bakhululwe kwezi mfuno. Ipasipothi yakho imele iphelelwe kwisithuba seenyanga eziyi-6 emva kohambo lwakho. Ukuba netikiti lokuya nokubuya/ukuya kwelinye ilzwe kuyafuneka ukuze ukwazi ukungqina ukuba uza kuhlala ixesha elingakanani.
mt: Ecuador is asking Cuba to allow its citizens to enter the country using neighboring countries' passports. The request was made by Ecuador's Foreign Minister, who also asked for the US to grant the same privilege to its citizens. The request is to allow citizens of both countries to travel between the two countries without a visa. Your ticket must be purchased at least six days in advance of your departure. If you are traveling to another country, you must be able to provide proof of your travel plans.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Izipeksi zamanye amazwe zinokubiza imali encincane kwamanye amazwe, ngokukhethekileyo kumazwe angafumanga apho abantu bebhatalwa imali encinci. Cinga ngokwenza uvavanyo lwamehlo ekhaya, ngakumbi ukuba i-inshurensi iza kulubhatalela, uze uze . I-frames zikanokutsho nezidumileyo ezikhoyo kwiindawo ezinjalo zineengxaki ezimbini; ezinye zinokuba yimigunyathi, kwaye ezona zifunyenwe kwamanye amazwe zinokubiza kakhulu kunasekhaya.
mt: 1. The poor in other countries are often the rich in poor countries. Consider how much you spend on your home, and how much an insurance company would pay out if it were destroyed. There are two frames here; one is a picture, and the other is a graph.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Imali yelizwe esemthethweni yaseFalklands yiponti yaseFalkland (FKP) ixabiso layo libekwe lalingan neponti yaseBritani (GBP). Imali ingatshintshiselwa kwibhanki ekuphela kwayo kwiziqithi ezibekwe eStanley ngaphaya kwivenkile yeFIC West. Iiponti zaseBritane ziya kwamkelwa ngokubanzi naphi na kwiziqithi kwaye ngaphakathi kwamakhadi etyala aseStanley nakwiidola zaseMelika zihlala zamkelwe. Kwiziqithi zangaphandle amakhasi emali angangamkelwa, kodwa imali yase-Britani neyase-Melika ingamkelwa; jonga kwabanikazi phambikofika ukwenzela ukwazi ukubayeyiphi indlela yokuhlawula eyaneleyo. Phantse akukwazeki ukutshintsha imali I-Falklands ngaphandle kwessiqithi, ngoko ke yitshintshe imali phambi kokushiya isiqithi.
mt: 1 Falkland pound (FKP) is worth 0.7 British pound (GBP). The exchange rate is set by the Falkland Islands Company West. ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Iitempile ezininzi zineminyhadala ebanjwa qho Ngonyaka ukususela ngoNovemba ukuya kuphela Phakathi ngoMeyi, kwaye yohlukana ngokwekhalenda yetempile nganye. Imibhiyozo eminizni yetempile ibhiyozelwa njengenxalenye yesikhumbuzo okanye imini yokuzalwa kothixo okhoyo okanye nasiphi na isiganeko esayanyaniswa netempile. Imibhiyozo yetempile yamaKerala inikeza umdla kakhulu xa uyibona, itsho ngemihombiso eqhelekileyo yeendlovu,umculo we orchestra neminye imibhiyozo.
mt: 10,000 people were killed in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami, and 1,000,000 were displaced. The tsunami was caused by a 9.1 magnitude earthquake, and was the deadliest tsunami in recorded history. The tsunami also affected the coastlines of Somalia, Kenya, Tanzania, Seychelles, Maldives, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Malaysia, Myanmar, Bangladesh, India, Indonesia, and the Maldives. The tsunami was also the deadliest natural disaster in the world in the 21st century. The tsunami was also the deadliest natural disaster in the world in the 21st century.

Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Indlela ecacileyo yokubhabha kudidi eluphezulu okanye udidi lweshishini kukukhupha imali enkulu ukuze ufumane lo nyweba (okanye okungcono, kukuba inkampani yakho ikwenzele lo nto). ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Iinqwelomoya ezinjenge Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways neTurkish Airlines zandise kakhulu iinkonzo zazo eAfrika, noqhakamshelwano kwizixeko ezininzi zase Afrika ngamaxabiso akhuphisana nayo kunezinye inwelomoya zase Europe. I-Turkish Airlines iya kwiindawo eziyi-39 kumazwe aseAfrika ayi-30 ukususela ngo-2014. Ukuba unexesha elongezelelekileyo lokukhenketha khangela ukuba ikowuti yakho epheleleyo yokuya e Afrika ukuthelekise neferi yokuhamba ihlabathi . Ungalibali ukongeza kwiindleko ezongezelelekileyo zeevisa, ezothutho, ezothutho emhlabeni, njl.njl. Kuzo zonke ezo ndawo zingaphandle kweAfrika.
mt: 39 destinations in Africa, 30 countries by 2014. If you are planning a trip to Africa, you should consider the visa requirements, vaccinations, and other health issues. All these countries are outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Ukuthenga ukutya evenkileni yeyona ndlela ingabiziyo yokuzondla. Kungekho mathuba okupheka, ukhetho lusingisele ekutyeni okuthengwa kuphekiw. Kuye kusanda ukubona iisuphamakethi ziya zisiba namacandelo awahlukahlukeneyo okutya okusele kuvuthiwe. Ezinye zide zibonelele ne-microwave okanye ezinye iindlela zokushushubeza ukutya, Kwamanye amazwe okanye iintlobo zeevenkile kukho ubuncinci indawo yokutyela enye emehlweni abantu, ihlala inendawo engacwangciswanga ngamaxabiso afikelelekayo.
mt: 1. Food poisoning is a common cause of illness. There is no single cause of food poisoning. It can be caused by bacteria, viruses, or toxins. 2. Some foods are more likely to cause food poisoning than others. 3. Food poisoning can be prevented by following proper food handling and preparation procedures. 4. Symptoms of food poisoning include nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, and abdominal pain. 5. Treatment for food poisoning depends on the cause. 6. Most cases of food poisoning are mild and resolve without treatment. 7. In severe cases, hospitalization may be necessary. 8. Food poisoning can be prevented by following proper food handling and preparation procedures.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
